verse.content: Mfitiaseɛ no, na Asɛm
no wɔ hɔ, na Asɛm no ne Onyankopɔn na ɛwɔ hɔ, na Asɛm no ara ne Nyankopɔn.
Ɔno ara na mfitiaseɛ no na ɔne Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ.
Ɛnam ne so na wɔyɛɛ nnoɔma nyinaa, na wɔankwati no anyɛ biribiara a wɔyɛeɛ.
Ne mu na nkwa wɔ, na nkwa no ne nnipa hann;
na hann no hyerɛn esum mu, na esum no anni no so.
Onipa bi wɔ hɔ a Onyankopɔn somaa no a ne din de Yohane.
Ɔno na ɔbaa adansedie sɛ ɔrebɛdi hann no ho adanseɛ, na nnipa nyinaa nam ne so agye adi.
Ɛnyɛ ɔno ne hann no, na mmom ɔbaa sɛ ɔrebɛdi hann no ho adanseɛ.
Nokorɛ hann a ɛhyerɛn ma onipa biara no na ɛreba wiase yi.
Ɔwɔ wiase dada, na ɛnam ne so na wɔyɛɛ wiase; nanso wiase anhu no.
Ɔbaa ɔno ara ne deɛ mu, na wɔn a wɔyɛ ɔno ara ne deɛ annye no.
Na dodoɔ a wɔgyee no no, wɔn a wɔgyee ne din diiɛ no, ɔmaa wɔn tumi sɛ wɔnyɛ Nyankopɔn mma
a ɛmfiri mogya anaasɛ deɛ ɔhonam pɛ anaasɛ deɛ ɔbarima pɛ mu, na mmom ɛfiri Nyankopɔn mu na wɔwoo wɔn.
Na Asɛm no bɛyɛɛ honam, na ɔbɛsoeɛɛ yɛn mu, na yɛhunuu n’animuonyam sɛ Agya no Ba a ɔwoo no korɔ animuonyam, na adom ne nokorɛ ayɛ no ma.
(Yohane dii ne ho adanseɛ na ɔteaa mu sɛ: Oyi ne deɛ mekaa sɛ: Deɛ ɔdi m’akyiri reba no, ɔkyɛne me, na ɔwɔ hɔ ansa na mereba.)
Na ɛfiri ne mayɛ no mu na yɛn nyinaa anya adom de abɔ adom soɔ.
Na mmara no deɛ, wɔnam Mose so na ɛmaeɛ; na adom ne nokorɛ no deɛ, ɛnam Yesu Kristo so na ɛbaeɛ.
Obi nhunuu Onyankopɔn pɛn; Ɔba a ɔwoo no korɔ no a ɔtwere Agya no kokom no, ɔno na wayi no adi akyerɛ.
Yei ne Yohane adanseɛ ɛberɛ a Yudafoɔ somaa asɔfoɔ ne Lewifoɔ firi Yerusalem sɛ wɔnkɔbisa no sɛ: Woyɛ hwan no.
Na ɔpaee mu kae, na wansane; na ɔpaee mu kaa sɛ: Ɛnyɛ mene Kristo no.
Na wɔbisaa no sɛ: Ɛnneɛ na hwan ne wo? Wone Elia? Na ɔse: Ɛnyɛ mene no. Wone odiyifoɔ no? Na ɔbuaa sɛ: Dabi.
Ɛnna wɔsee no sɛ: Hwan ne wo? Na yɛnnya bi nkɔbua wɔn a wɔsomaa yɛn no; woka wo ho asɛm bɛn?
Ɔse:

block_quote.content: Mene ɛnne a ɛtea mu ɛserɛ so sɛ:

verse.content: Nso na wɔn a wɔsomaa wɔn no firi Farisifoɔ mu.
Na wɔbisaa no sɛ: Sɛ wonyɛ Kristo no, anaa Elia anaa odiyifoɔ no a, ɛnneɛ adɛn nti na wobɔ asu yi?
Yohane buaa wɔn sɛ: Me deɛ, mebɔ asu nsuo mu, na obi a monni no gyina mo mfimfini.
Ɔno ne deɛ ɔdi m’akyiri reba a mensɛ sɛ mesane ne mpaboa homa mpo.
Yeinom sii wɔ Betania, Yordan agya nohoa, faako a Yohane rebɔ asu hɔ.
Adeɛ kyeeɛ no, Yohane hunuu Yesu sɛ ɔreba ne nkyɛn, na ɔse: Hwɛ Nyankopɔn adwammaa a ɔyi wiase bɔne korɔ no nie.
Oyi ne deɛ mekaa wɔ ne ho sɛ: Ɔbarima bi di m’akyiri reba a ɔkyɛne me mpo, ɛfiri sɛ ɔdii m’anim kan.
Na me deɛ, anka mennim no; na sɛ wɔbɛyi no akyerɛ Israel nti na meba mebɛbɔɔ asu nsuo mu.
Na Yohane dii adanseɛ sɛ: Mehunuu Honhom no sɛ ɔfiri soro resiane sɛ aburuburo, na ɔbɛtenaa ne so.
Na me deɛ, anka mennim no, na deɛ ɔsomaa me sɛ memmɛbɔ asu nsuo mu no, ɔno na ɔsee me sɛ: Deɛ wobɛhunu sɛ Honhom no resiane abɛtena ne soɔ no, ɔno ne deɛ ɔbɔ asu Honhom Kronkron mu.
Na mahunu na madi adanseɛ sɛ, oyi ne Nyankopɔn ba no.
Adeɛ kyee bio no, na Yohane ne n’asuafoɔ mu baanu gyina hɔ.
Na ɔhunuu Yesu a ɔnenam hɔ no, ɔkaa sɛ: Hwɛ, Nyankopɔn adwammaa no nie!
Na asuafoɔ baanu no tee sɛ ɔrekasa, na wɔkɔdii Yesu akyi.
Na Yesu danee ne ho na ɔhunuu wɔn sɛ wɔdi n’akyire no, ɔbisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Morehwehwɛ deɛn?

verse.content: Na wɔsee no sɛ: Rabi (ne nkyerɛaseɛ ne Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ), ɛhe na woteɛ?
Ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mommra mmɛhwɛ!

verse.content: Enti wɔkɔe, na wɔkɔhunuu faako a ɔteɛ; na wɔtenaa ne nkyɛn ɛda no; na ɛbɛyɛ sɛ anwummerɛ nnɔnnan.
Andrea, Simon Petro nua, yɛ baanu no a wɔtee sɛ Yohane rekasa na wɔdii n’akyire no mu baako.
Ɔno na ɔhunuu ɔno ara ne nua Simon kane, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Yɛahunu Mesaia (ne nkyerɛaseɛ ne Kristo) no.
Na ɔde no baa Yesu nkyɛn. Na Yesu hunuu no no, ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Wone Simon, Yohane ba, wɔbɛfrɛ wo Kefa (ne nkyerɛaseɛ ne Petro).

verse.content: Adeɛ kyeeɛ no, Yesu pɛɛ sɛ ɔfiri hɔ kɔ Galilea; na ɔhunuu Filipo. Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Di m’akyi!

verse.content: Nso Filipo firi Betsaida, Andrea ne Petro kuro mu.
Filipo hunuu Natanael, na ɔsee no sɛ: Deɛ Mose, wɔ mmara no mu ne adiyifoɔ no twerɛɛ ne ho asɛm no, yɛahu no, Yesu, Yosef ba a ɔfiri Nasaret no.
Na Natanael see no sɛ: Biribi pa bi bɛtumi afiri Nasaret da? Filipo see no sɛ: Bra bɛhwɛ!
Yesu hunuu Natanael sɛ ɔreba ne nkyɛn, na ɔkaa wɔ ne ho sɛ:

wj.content: Hwɛ, nokorɛ Israelni a nnaadaa nni ne mu nie!

verse.content: Natanael see no sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na wode hunuu me? Yesu bua see no sɛ:

wj.content: Filipo nnya mfrɛɛ woɔ, a na wowɔ borɔdɔma no aseɛ no na mehunuu woɔ.

verse.content: Natanael bua see no sɛ: Rabi, wone Nyankopɔn ba, wone Israel hene no!
Yesu bua see no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛsiane sɛ meka mekyerɛɛ wo sɛ mehunuu wo borɔdɔma no aseɛ no nti na ɛma wogye die yi anaa? Wobɛhunu nnoɔma akɛseɛ a ɛsene yeinom.

verse.content: Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ, mobɛhunu ɔsoro sɛ abue, na Nyankopɔn abɔfoɔ redi aforosiane Onipa Ba no soɔ.

note.content: ASƐM yɛ nkyerɛaseɛ baako a ɛfiri Hela kasa LƆGƆS mu. Hela kasa yi ase kyerɛ yɛ kyerɛ na, nanso NKWA FAREBAE ne deɛ ɛbɛn Hela kasa LƆGƆS no yie wɔ Yohane Asɛmpa no mu.

verse.content: Na da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no, wɔhyiaa ayeforɔ wɔ Kana a ɛwɔ Galilea; na Yesu ne na wɔ hɔ.
Na wɔtoo nsa frɛɛ Yesu ne n’asuafoɔ nso baa ayeforɔ no ase.
Na nsa no anso no, Yesu ne na see no sɛ: Wɔnni nsa.
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔbaa, ɛdeɛn na me ne wo wɔ yɛ? Me dɔn nnurui!

verse.content: Na ne na see asomfoɔ no sɛ: Biribiara a ɔbɛse mo no, monyɛ!
Nso na aboɔ nsuhina nsia sisi hɔ, sɛdeɛ Yudafoɔ ahodwira teɛ, baako bɛtumi agye galɔn aduonu anaa aduasa.
Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Momfa nsuo nhyehyɛ nhina yi mama!

verse.content: Na wɔhyehyɛɛ no ma tɛntɛnn.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Afei monsesa mfa nkɔma adidiiɛhwɛfoɔ no!

verse.content: Na wɔde kɔeɛ. Na adidiiɛhwɛfoɔ no kaa nsuo a adane nsa no hwɛeɛ no, na ɔnnim deɛ ɛfire, (na asomfoɔ a wɔsesaa nsuo no deɛ, wɔnim) na adidiiɛhwɛfoɔ no frɛɛ ayeforɔkunu no,
na ɔsee no sɛ: Nnipa nyinaa de nsa pa na ɛbɛsisi hɔ kane, na sɛ wɔboboro a, ɛno ansa na wɔde deɛ ɛnyɛ ba; na wo deɛ, wode nsa pa no asie abɛduru sɛsɛɛ.
Yesu nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ no mu deɛ ɛdi kan yi, ɔyɛɛ no Kana a ɛwɔ Galilea; na ɔyii n’animuonyam kyerɛe; na n’asuafoɔ no gyee no diiɛ.
Yei akyiri no, Yesu kɔɔ Kapernaum, ɔno ne ne na, ne nuanom ne n’asuafoɔ no; na wɔanni nna bebree wɔ hɔ.
Na Yudafoɔ Twam da abɛn, na Yesu kɔɔ Yerusalem.
Na ɔkɔhunuu wɔn a wɔtɔn anantwie ne nnwan ne mmorɔnoma ne sikasesafoɔ sɛ wɔtete asɔrefie.
Na ɔde homa yɛɛ mpire pamm wɔn nyinaa, nnwan ne anantwie no firii asɔrefie hɔ, na ɔhwiee sikasesafoɔ no sika guiɛ, na ɔkaa apono no butubutui;
na ɔsee wɔn a wɔtɔn mmorɔnoma no sɛ:

wj.content: Momfa yeinom mfiri ha, monnyɛ m’Agya fie adwadie fie!

verse.content: Na n’asuafoɔ no kaee sɛ wɔatwerɛ sɛ: Wo fie ho mmɔdemmɔ bɛhyɛ me ma.
Ɛnna Yudafoɔ no bua see no sɛ: Nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ bɛn na wode kyerɛ yɛn a enti woyɛ yeinom?
Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monnwiri asɔredan yi, na mede nnansa bɛma so bio.

verse.content: Ɛnna Yudafoɔ no se: Mfirinhyia aduanan nsia na wɔde sii asɔredan yi, na wo deɛ, nnansa na wode bɛma soɔ?
Deɛ ɔkaeɛ no, na ɔne ne nipadua asɔredan.
Enti, ɔsɔre firii awufoɔ mu no, n’asuafoɔ no kaee sɛ waka yei, na wɔgyee twerɛ no ne nsɛm a Yesu kaeɛ no diiɛ.
Nso ɔwɔ Yerusalem Twam afahyɛ ase no, nnipa bebree hunuu ne nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ a ɔyɛeɛ no, wɔgyee ne din diiɛ.
Na Yesu no ara deɛ, wamfa ne ho anto wɔn so, ɛfiri sɛ ɔnim wɔn nyinaa,
na ɛnhia no sɛ obi di onipa ho adanseɛ; ɛfiri sɛ ɔno ara nim deɛ ɛwɔ onipa mu.
Na onipa bi firi Farisifoɔ mu wɔ hɔ a ne din de Nikodemo a ɔyɛ Yudafoɔ panin bi;
ɔno na ɔbaa Yesu nkyɛn anadwo, na ɔbɛsee no sɛ: Rabi, yɛnim sɛ wofiri Nyankopɔn nkyɛn na aba sɛ ɔkyerɛkyerɛni; na obi ntumi nyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ a woyɛ yi, gye sɛ Onyankopɔn ka ne ho.
Yesu bua see no sɛ:

wj.content: Mereka akyerɛ wo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ: Wɔanwo obi foforɔ a, ɔrentumi nhunu Nyankopɔn ahennie no.

verse.content: Nikodemo see no sɛ: Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na onipa a wanyini no, wɔbɛtumi awo no? Ɔbɛtumi akɔ ne na yam bio na wɔawo no anaa?
Yesu buaa sɛ:

wj.content: Mereka no nokorɛ mu pefee akyerɛ wo sɛ: Wɔamfiri nsuo ne honhom mu anwo obi a, ɔrentumi nhyɛne Nyankopɔn ahennie mu.
Deɛ wɔfiri ɔhonam mu awo no no yɛ ɔhonam; na deɛ wɔfiri Honhom mu awo no no yɛ honhom.
Mma no nnyɛ wo nwanwa sɛ meka mekyerɛɛ wo sɛ: Ɛtwa sɛ wɔwo mo foforɔ.
Mframa bɔ kɔ faako a ɛpɛ, na wote ne nka, na wonnim faako a ɛfire ne faako a ɛrekorɔ. Saa ara nso na obiara a wɔawo no Honhom mu no teɛ.

verse.content: Nikodemo bua see no sɛ: Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yeinom ayɛ hɔ?
Yesu bua see no sɛ:

wj.content: Woyɛ Israel kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ na wonnim yeinom?
Mereka akyerɛ wo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ: Deɛ yɛnim na yɛka, na deɛ yɛahunu na yɛdi ho adanseɛ; nanso monnye yɛn adanseɛ no.
Sɛ maka mo fam asɛm na monnye nni a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na sɛ meka mo ɔsoro nsɛm a, mobɛgye adie?
Na obi mforo nkɔɔ ɔsoro, gye deɛ ɔfiri ɔsoro sianeeɛ no, Onipa Ba a ɔwɔ ɔsoro no.
Na sɛdeɛ Mose maa ɔwɔ no so wɔ ɛserɛ soɔ no, saa ara na ɛtwa sɛ wɔma Onipa Ba no soɔ,
na obiara a ɔgye no die no anya daa nkwa.
Na sɛdeɛ Onyankopɔn dɔɔ wiase nie, sɛ ɔde ne Ba a ɔwoo no korɔ no maeɛ, na obiara a ɔgye no die no anyera, na wanya daa nkwa.
Na Onyankopɔn ansoma Ɔba no amma wiase sɛ ɔmmɛbu wiase atɛn, na mmom sɛ wɔmfa ne so nnye wiase.
Deɛ ɔgye no die no, wɔmmu no atɛn; na deɛ ɔnnye nnie no, wɔabu no atɛn dada sɛ wannye Nyankopɔn ba korɔ no din no annie.
Na yei mmom ne atemmuo no, sɛ hann no aba wiase na nnipa dɔ esum sene hann no; ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nnwuma yɛ bɔne.
Obiara a ɔyɛ bɔne no tane hann no, na ɔmma hann no ho, na wɔammu no ne nnwuma ho atɛn.
Na deɛ ɔyɛ deɛ ɛyɛ nokorɛ no ba hann no ho sɛ ne nnwuma mmɛda adi, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛɛ no Nyankopɔn mu.

verse.content: Yeinom akyiri no, Yesu ne n’asuafoɔ no baa Yudea asase so; na ɔne wɔn tenaa hɔ, na ɔbɔɔ asu.
Na Yohane nso rebɔ asu wɔ Ainon a ɛbɛn Salim, ɛfiri sɛ asuasu pii wɔ hɔ, na wɔbaa hɔ ma wɔbɔɔ wɔn asu.
Na wɔnnya mfaa Yohane ntoo afiase.
Ɛnna ahodwira ho akyinnyegyeɛ bi sɔree Yohane asuafoɔ ne Yudafoɔ ntam.
Na wɔbaa Yohane nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Rabi, deɛ ɔbaa wo nkyɛn Yordan agya nohoa a wodii ne ho adanseɛ no, hwɛ, ɔno nso rebɔ asu, na nnipa nyinaa rekɔ ne nkyɛn.
Yohane bua kaa sɛ: Onipa ntumi nnya biribi, gye sɛ wɔde firi soro ama no ansa.
Mo ara modi me adanseɛ sɛ mekaa sɛ: Ɛnyɛ mene Kristo no, na wɔsomaa me dii n’anim.
Deɛ ayeforɔ wɔ no ne ayeforɔkunu; na ayeforɔkunu adamfo a ɔgyina hɔ na ɔtie no deɛ, ɛgyeɛ na n’ani gyeɛ, ayeforɔkunu no nne nti. Ɛno nti afei na me saa anigyeɛ yi awie pɛyɛ.
Ɔno deɛ, ɛtwa sɛ ɔkɔ kan sene me, na me deɛ, medi akyire.
Deɛ ɔfiri soro ba no sene nnipa nyinaa. Deɛ ɔfiri fam no firi fam, na ɔfiri fam kasa; deɛ ɔfiri soro ba no sene nnipa nyinaa,
na deɛ wahunu na wateɛ no, ɛno ho adanseɛ na ɔdie; nanso obi nnye n’adanseɛ no.
Deɛ ɔgye n’adanseɛ no asi agyinae sɛ Onyankopɔn yɛ ɔnokwafoɔ.
Na deɛ Onyankopɔn asoma no no ka Nyankopɔn nsɛm; na Onyankopɔn de Honhom ma mmorosoɔ.
Agya no dɔ Ɔba no, na ɔde nnoɔma nyinaa ahyɛ ne nsa.
Deɛ ɔgye Ɔba no die no wɔ daa nkwa; na deɛ ɔntie Ɔba no deɛ, ɔrenya nkwa, na Nyankopɔn abufuo da ne so.
Afei Yesu
hunuu sɛ Farisifoɔ ate sɛ: Ɔno Yesu renya asuafoɔ bebree, na ɔrebɔ nnipa pii asu sene Yohane.
Nso Yesu no ara deɛ, na ɔmmɔ asu, na mmom n’asuafoɔ no.
Ɔfirii Yudea, na ɔsii mu kɔɔ Galilea bio.
Na ɛtwa sɛ ɔfa Samaria.
Na afei ɔduruu Samaria kuro bi a wɔfrɛ no Sikar a ɛbɛn asasewa a Yakob de maa ne ba Yosef no ho.
Nso na Yakob abura wɔ hɔ. Na ɛnam sɛ Yesu abrɛ wɔ n’akwantuo mu nti, ɔtenaa abura no so. Na abɔ bɛyɛ sɛ awia dummienu.
Na ɔbaa bi a ɔfiri Samaria baa hɔ bɛtoo nsuo. Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Ma me bi mennom!

verse.content: Na n’asuafoɔ no kɔ kuro no mu rekɔtɔ aduane.
Ɛnna Samariani baa no see no sɛ: Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wo a woyɛ Yudani, bisa me a meyɛ Samariani baa hɔ nsuo anom? (Ɔkaa saa ɛfiri sɛ na Yudafoɔ ne Samariafoɔ nka.)
Yesu bua see no sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ wonim Nyankopɔn akyɛdeɛ, ne deɛ ɔse wo sɛ: Ma me bi mennom yi a, anka wobɛbisa no, na wama wo nkwa nsuo.

verse.content: Ɔbaa no ka kyerɛɛ Yesu sɛ: Owura, wonni adeɛ a wɔde toɔ, na abura no mu nso dɔ, enti ɛhe na wonya nkwa nsuo no fire?
Woyɛ kɛseɛ sene yɛn agya Yakob a ɔmaa yɛn abura yi, na ɔno ara ne ne mma ne ne mmoa nomm bie no anaa?
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Obiara a ɔnom nsuo yi bie no, osukɔm bɛde no bio.
Na deɛ ɔbɛnom nsuo a mɛma no bie no deɛ, osukɔm renne no da; na nsuo a mɛma no no bɛyɛ nsuo abura a ɛfifiri kɔ daa nkwa mu wɔ ne mu.

verse.content: Ɔbaa no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Owura, ma me saa nsuo yi bi, na osukɔm anne me, na mamma ha mammɛto nsuo.
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Kɔfrɛ wo kunu bra ha!

verse.content: Ɔbaa no bua kaa sɛ: Menni kunu. Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Woaka no yie sɛ wose: Menni kunu;
na wo ne mmarima baanum na atena, na deɛ wo ne no wɔ hɔ seesei ara yi mpo, ɔnyɛ wo kunu. Yei deɛ woaka no nokorɛ mu.

verse.content: Ɔbaa no see no sɛ: Owura, mahunu sɛ woyɛ odiyifoɔ.
Yɛn agyanom sɔree bepɔ yi so; na mo deɛ, moka sɛ Yerusalem ne faako a ɛsɛ sɛ wɔsɔre.
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔbaa, gye me di sɛ, dɔn no reba a ɛnyɛ bepɔ yi so, anaasɛ Yerusalem na mobɛsɔre Agya no.
Mosɔre deɛ monnim; yɛn deɛ, yɛsɔre deɛ yɛnim, ɛfiri sɛ nkwagyeɛ no firi Yudafoɔ mu.
Na dɔn no reba, na adu, sɛ wɔn a wɔsɔre nokorɛ mu no bɛsɔre Agya no honhom ne nokorɛ mu; na wɔn a wɔsɔre no saa no na Agya no rehwehwɛ.
Onyankopɔn yɛ honhom, na wɔn a wɔsɔre no no, ɛsɛ sɛ wɔsɔre no honhom ne nokorɛ mu.

verse.content: Ɔbaa no see no sɛ: Menim sɛ Mesaia (a wɔfrɛ no Kristo) no reba; na sɛ ɔba a, ɔno na ɔbɛkyerɛ yɛn nnoɔma nyinaa.
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Me a me ne wo rekasa yi, mene no.

verse.content: Saa berɛ no ara na n’asuafoɔ no baeɛ, na ɛyɛɛ wɔn nwanwa sɛ ɔne ɔbaa no rekasa, nanso obi ammisa no sɛ: Deɛn na wohwehwɛ? Anaasɛ: Adɛn na wo ne ɔbaa no rekasa yi?
Ɛnna ɔbaa no gyaa n’asuhina no hɔ, na ɔkɔɔ kuro no mu kɔka kyerɛɛ nnipa no sɛ:
Mommra mmɛhwɛ onipa bi a waka deɛ mayɛ nyinaa akyerɛ me, sɛ ɛnyɛ oyi ne Kristo no anaa?
Ɛnna nkurɔfoɔ no firii kuro no mu baa Yesu nkyɛn.
Saa berɛ no mu no n’asuafoɔ no see no sɛ: Rabi, didi!
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mewɔ aduane medi a monnim.

verse.content: Enti n’asuafoɔ no sesee wɔn ho sɛ: Obi abrɛ no biribi adi anaa?
Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: M’aduane ne sɛ meyɛ deɛ ɔsomaa me no apɛdeɛ, na mewie n’adwuma.
Ɛyɛ a, monka sɛ aka abosome nnan na otwa berɛ adu anaa? Hwɛ, mese mo sɛ, momma mo ani so, na monhwɛ mfuo mu, sɛ anya ahoa ama otwa.
Na deɛ ɔtwa no gye akatua, na ɔboaboa aba no ano kɔ daa nkwa mu; na deɛ ɔguiɛ ne deɛ ɔtwaeɛ nyinaa ani agye prɛko.
Na yei mu na asɛm no yɛ nokorɛ sɛ: Obi gu, na obi twa.
Me deɛ, mesomaa mo sɛ monkɔtwa deɛ moanyɛ ho adwuma; ebinom abrɛ wɔn ho ayɛ, na mo deɛ, moabɛdi wɔn adwuma no so aba.

verse.content: Na Samariafoɔ a wɔwɔ kuro no mu no mu pii gyee no dii, ɛsiane ɔbaa no adanseɛ a ɔdii sɛ: Waka deɛ mayɛ nyinaa akyerɛ me, no nti.
Enti Samariafoɔ no baa ne nkyɛn no, wɔsrɛɛ no sɛ ɔntena wɔn nkyɛn; na ɔtenaa hɔ nnanu.
Na nnipa pii a ɛsene kane deɛ no gyee no dii n’asɛm nti,
na nkurɔfoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ ɔbaa no sɛ: Afei ɛnyɛ w’asɛm nti na yɛgye die, na yɛn ara yɛate, na yɛahunu sɛ oyi ne wiase Agyenkwa no ampa.
Na nnanu akyiri no, Yesu firii hɔ kɔɔ Galilea.
Na Yesu no ara dii adanseɛ sɛ, odiyifoɔ nni anidie ɔno ara ne kuro mu.
Na ɔduruu Galilea no, Galileafoɔ no a wɔhunuu deɛ ɔyɛeɛ Yerusalem afahyɛ ase no nyinaa gyee no; ɛfiri sɛ wɔn nso wɔbaa afahyɛ no ase bi.
Ɛnna ɔkɔɔ Kana a ɛwɔ Galilea, faako a ɔdanee nsuo nsa no bio. Na ahenkwaa panin bi wɔ hɔ a ne ba yare wɔ Kapernaum.
Na ɔtee sɛ Yesu firi Yudea aba Galilea no, ɔsii mu kɔɔ ne nkyɛn, na ɔsrɛɛ no sɛ ɔmmra mmɛsa ne ba yadeɛ; na ɔreyɛ awu.
Ɛnna Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ moanhunu nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ne nkonyaa a, morennye nni.

verse.content: Ahenkwaa panin no see no sɛ: Owura, bra, na me ba no anwu ansa.
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Kɔ, wo ba no ho ayɛ no den!

verse.content: Na onipa no gyee asɛm a Yesu ka kyerɛɛ no no diiɛ, na ɔkɔeɛ.
Na ɔrekorɔ no, ne nkoa bɛhyiaa no, na wɔkaa sɛ: Wo ba no ho ayɛ no den!
Ɛnna ɔbisaa wɔn dɔn korɔ a ne ho tɔɔ no. Na wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Nnora bɛyɛ awia dɔnko no na ɔfoɛ no gyaa no.
Ɛnna agya no hunuu sɛ ɛyɛ dɔn no ara a Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Wo ba no ho ayɛ no den

verse.content: no mu; na ɔno ne ne fiefoɔ nyinaa gye diiɛ.
Yei nso ne nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ a ɛtɔ so mmienu a Yesu firi Yudea baa Galilea no, ɔyɛeɛ.

note.content: Tete atwerɛ a wɔgye to mu binom ka sɛ;
Tete atwerɛ a wɔgye to mu binom nka saa asɛm yi.

verse.content: Yei akyiri no, Yudafoɔ afahyɛ duruiɛ, na Yesu kɔɔ Yerusalem.
Nso ɔtadeɛ bi wɔ Yerusalem Nnwanten Pono kɛseɛ no ho a wɔfrɛ no Hebri mu sɛ Betesda a ɛwɔ ntwonoo nnum.
Na yeinom mu na nnipa pii, ayarefoɔ, anifirafoɔ, mpakye ne wɔn a wɔn fa awuwuo deda [retwɛn nsuo no wosoɔ.
Na ɛduru berɛ bi mu a, ɔbɔfoɔ siane ba tadeɛ no mu bɛhono nsuo no, na deɛ nsuo no hono akyiri no, ɔdi kan kɔ mu no, yadeɛ biara a ɔyareɛ no, na ne ho ayɛ no den.]
Na onipa bi wɔ hɔ a wadi mfirinhyia aduasa nwɔtwe n’ahoɔmmerɛ mu.
Ɔno na Yesu hunuu no sɛ ɔda hɔ, na ɔnim sɛ wakyɛre hɔ no, ɔbisaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Wopɛ sɛ wo ho yɛ wo den anaa?

verse.content: Ɔyarefoɔ no buaa no sɛ: Owura, menni onipa bi a sɛ nsuo no hono a, ɔde me kɔto tadeɛ no mu; na sɛ merekɔ a, na obi adi m’anim kan kɔ mu.
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Sɔre, yi wo kɛtɛ, na nante!

verse.content: Na ntɛm ara onipa no ho yɛɛ no den, na ɔyii ne kɛtɛ, na ɔnanteeɛ. Nso na da no yɛ homeda.
Enti Yudafoɔ no ka kyerɛɛ deɛ wɔasa no yadeɛ no sɛ: Ɛnnɛ yɛ homeda; wonni ho kwan sɛ wosoa wo kɛtɛ.
Ɔbuaa wɔn sɛ: Deɛ ɔmaa me ho yɛɛ me den no, ɔno ara na ɔsee me sɛ:

wj.content: Yi wo kɛtɛ, na nante!

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔbisaa no sɛ: Hwan ne onipa a ɔsee wo sɛ: Yi wo kɛtɛ na nante no?
Nso deɛ ne ho asane no no nnim onipa ko; ɛfiri sɛ na nkurɔfokuo no wɔ hɔ nti, na Yesu nso atwe ne ho afiri hɔ.
Yei akyiri no, Yesu hunuu no asɔrefie, na ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Hwɛ, wo ho ayɛ wo den; nyɛ bɔne bio, na deɛ ɛyɛ bɔne sene yei anyɛ wo.

verse.content: Onipa no sii mu kɔ kɔka kyerɛɛ Yudafoɔ no sɛ ɛyɛ Yesu na ɔmaa ne ho yɛɛ no den.
Na yei nti Yudafoɔ no taa Yesu, ɛfiri sɛ wayɛ nnoɔma yi homeda.
Na ɔbuaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: M’Agya gu so yɛ adwuma bɛsi sɛsɛɛ, na me nso meyɛ adwuma.

verse.content: Na yei mmom nti afei Yudafoɔ no hwehwɛɛ sɛ wɔkum no, sɛ ɛnyɛ homeda nko na wasɛe no, na mmom ɔfrɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ ɔno ara n’Agya de yɛ ne ho sɛ ɔno ne Onyankopɔn yɛ pɛ.
Ɛnna Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ, Ɔba no ara ntumi mmɔ ne tirim nyɛ hwee, gye deɛ wahunu Agya no sɛ ɔyɛ; ɛfiri sɛ biribiara a ɔno yɛ no, ɛno ara na Ɔba no nso yɛ.
Na Agya no dɔ Ɔba no, na ɔkyerɛ no deɛ ɔno ara yɛ nyinaa; na ɔbɛkyerɛ no nnwuma akɛseɛ a ɛsene yeinom, na ayɛ mo nwanwa.
Na sɛdeɛ Agya no nyane awufoɔ, na ɔma wɔn nkwa no, saa ara na Ɔba no nso ma wɔn a ɔpɛ nkwa.
Na Agya no nso mmu obiara atɛn, na ɔde atemmuo nyinaa ahyɛ Ɔba no nsa,
sɛ wɔn nyinaa nni Ɔba no ni, sɛdeɛ wɔdi Agya no ni no. Deɛ ɔnni Ɔba no ni no nni Agya a ɔsomaa no no ni.
Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ: Deɛ ɔte m’asɛm, na ɔgye deɛ ɔsomaa me no die no wɔ daa nkwa, na ɔremma atemmuo mu, na watwa mu afiri owuo mu kɔ nkwa mu.
Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ: Dɔn no reba na anya adu a awufoɔ bɛte Nyankopɔn ba no nne, na wɔn a wɔteɛ no bɛnya nkwa.
Na sɛdeɛ Agya no wɔ nkwa ɔno ara mu no, saa ara na ɔde ama Ɔba no nso sɛ ɔnnya nkwa ɔno ara mu;
na wama no tumi sɛ ɔmmu atɛn nso, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ Onipa Ba.
Mommma yei nnyɛ mo nwanwa, ɛfiri sɛ dɔn no reba a wɔn a wɔwɔ adakamena mu nyinaa bɛte ne nne,
na wɔafiri adi, na wɔn a wɔayɛ papa no bɛkɔ nkwa wusɔreɛ mu, na wɔn a wɔayɛ bɔne no bɛkɔ atemmuo wusɔreɛ mu.
Me deɛ, mentumi menhyɛ me ho menyɛ hwee; sɛdeɛ meteɛ no, na mebu atɛn, na m’atemmuo no yɛ tenenee. Na menhwehwɛ deɛ me ara mepɛ, na deɛ ɔsomaa me no apɛdeɛ.
Sɛ me ara medi me ho adanseɛ a, m’adanseɛ no nyɛ nokorɛ.
Obi wɔ hɔ a ɔdi me ho adanseɛ, na menim sɛ adanseɛ a ɔdi me ho no yɛ nokorɛ.
Mo deɛ, moasoma akɔ Yohane nkyɛn, na wadi nokorɛ adanseɛ;
na me deɛ, mennye adanseɛ onipa bi nkyɛn, na meka yeinom, na moanya nkwa.
Ɔno ne kanea a ɛdɛre na ɛhyerɛn; na mo deɛ, mopɛɛ sɛ mo ani gye kakra ne hann no mu.
Na me deɛ, mewɔ adanseɛ a ɛsene Yohane deɛ no; na nnwuma a Agya no de ama me sɛ menwie no, nnwuma no ara a meyɛ no di me ho adanseɛ sɛ Agya no na asoma me.
Na Agya no a ɔsomaa me no ara adi me ho adanseɛ. Moante ne nne ara da, nso moanhunu ne suban;
na monni n’asɛm no wɔ mo mu, ɛfiri sɛ deɛ ɔsomaa no no, monnye no nni!
Mohwehwɛ atwerɛsɛm no mu, ɛfiri sɛ mosusu sɛ mowɔ daa nkwa wɔ mu; na ɛno ne deɛ ɛdi me ho adanseɛ,
na mompɛ sɛ moba me nkyɛn, na moanya nkwa.
Mennye animuonyam mfiri nnipa nkyɛn,
na mahu mo sɛ monni Nyankopɔn dɔ wɔ mo mu.
Me deɛ, mebaa m’Agya din mu, na monnye me; sɛ ɔfoforɔ ba ɔno ara din mu a, ɔno na mobɛgye no.
Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na mo a mogye animuonyam mo ho mo ho nkyɛn bɛtumi agye adie, mo a Onyankopɔn koro no nkyɛn animuonyam deɛ, monhwehwɛ?
Monnsusu sɛ mɛbɔ mo kwaadu, Agya no anim, na deɛ ɔbɔ mo kwaadu no wɔ hɔ; ɔne Mose a mode mo ani ato ne soɔ no.
Na sɛ mogye Mose di a, anka mobɛgye me adi; na me ho nsɛm no, ɔno na ɔtwerɛeɛ.
Na sɛ monnye n’atwerɛsɛm no nni a, ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na mobɛgye me nsɛm adie?

note.content: Tete atwerɛ a wɔgye to mu binom mfa saa asɛm yi nka ho.

verse.content: Yeinom akyiri no, Yesu sii mu kɔɔ Galilea po a ɛne Tiberia po no agya.
Na nkurɔfokuo kɛseɛ dii n’akyi, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔahunu nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ a ɔyɛɛ no wɔn a wɔyareɛ ho.
Na Yesu kɔɔ bepɔ no so, na ɔne n’asuafoɔ no kɔtenaa hɔ.
Nso na Twam da a ɛyɛ Yudafoɔ afahyɛ no abɛn.
Afei Yesu maa n’ani so, na ɔhunuu sɛ ɛdɔm kɛseɛ reba ne nkyɛn no, ɔsee Filipo sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛhe na yɛbɛtɔ paanoo ama yeinom adie?

verse.content: Na yei deɛ, ɔka de sɔɔ no hwɛe, ɛfiri sɛ na ɔno ara nim deɛ ɔrebɛyɛ.
Filipo buaa no sɛ: Paanoo denare ahanu renso wɔn sɛ wɔn mu biara bɛnya kakra.
Na asuafoɔ no mu baako, Andrea, Simon Petro nua, ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:
Abarimaa bi wɔ ha a ɔwɔ atokoɔ paanoo nnum ne mpataa nketewa mmienu; na yei yɛ deɛn ma nnipa pii yi?
Yesu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Momma nnipa no ntenatena ase!

verse.content: Nso na ɛserɛ pii wɔ hɔ. Ɛnna mmarima a wɔn ano bɛyɛ mpemnum no tenatenaa aseɛ.
Na Yesu faa paanoo no ne mpataa no, na ɔdaa ase no, ɔkyɛ maa wɔn a wɔtete hɔ no; dodoɔ biara a wɔhia.
Na wɔmeemeeɛ no, ɔsee n’asuafoɔ no sɛ: Mommoaboa mporoporowa a aka no ano, na ebi anyera.
Ɛnna wɔboaboaa ano, na wɔde atokoɔ paanoo nnum no mporoporowa a ɛka maa wɔn a wɔdiiɛ no hyehyɛɛ nkɛntɛn dummienu mama.
Afei nnipa no hunuu nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ a Yesu yɛeɛ no, wɔkaa sɛ: Ampa, odiyifoɔ a ɔreba wiase no nie!
Ɛnna Yesu hunuu sɛ wɔreba abɛfa no, ahyɛ no de no akɔsi hene nti, ɔtwee ne ho, na ɔno nko ara kɔɔ bepɔ no so bio.
Na ɛduruu anwummerɛ no, n’asuafoɔ no kɔɔ mpoano,
na wɔkɔɔ kodoɔ mu twaa po no sɛ wɔrekɔ Kapernaum. Na esum aduru dada, na Yesu nnya mmaa wɔn nkyɛn,
na mframa kɛseɛ bɔeɛ nti, ɛpo no huruii.
Na wɔharee bɛyɛ akwansin mmiɛnsa anaa nnan no, wɔhunuu Yesu sɛ ɔnam po no soɔ, na ɔretwe pini kodoɔ no; na wɔsuroeɛ.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛyɛ me, monnsuro!

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔde anigyeɛ maa no baa kodoɔ no mu, na ntɛm ara na kodoɔ no duruu asase a wɔrekɔ hɔ no so.
Adeɛ kyeeɛ no, na nkurɔfokuo a wɔgyina ɛpo no agya no hunuu sɛ kodoɔ biara nni hɔ sɛ baako a n’asuafoɔ no kɔɔ mu, nanso ɛnyɛ Yesu ne wɔn na ɛkɔɔ kodoɔ no mu no, n’asuafoɔ no nko na wɔkɔeɛ.
Na akodoɔ foforɔ firii Tiberia baa faako a Awurade daa ase, na wɔdii paanoo no hɔ;
enti nkurɔfokuo no hunuu sɛ Yesu nni hɔ na n’asuafoɔ no nso nni hɔ no, wɔn nso kɔɔ akodoɔ no mu, na wɔbaa Kapernaum bɛhwehwɛɛ Yesu.
Na wɔhunuu no ɛpo no agya no, wɔsee no sɛ: Rabi, da bɛn na wobaa ha?
Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ, ɛnyɛ sɛ mohunuu nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ nti na mohwehwɛ me, na sɛ modii paanoo no bie na momeeɛ ntira.
Monnyɛ aduane a ɛsɛeɛ ho adwuma, na mmom aduane a ɛtena hɔ kɔ daa nkwa mu a Onipa Ba no de bɛma mo; na ɔno na Agya Nyankopɔn asɔ no ano.

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔsee no sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na yɛnyɛ na yɛayɛ Nyankopɔn nnwuma?
Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Yei ne Nyankopɔn adwuma, sɛ mobɛgye deɛ ɔsomaa no no adie.

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔsee no sɛ: Ɛnneɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ bɛn na woreyɛ, na yɛahunu na yɛagye wo adie? Ɛdeɛn na woreyɛ?
Yɛn agyanom dii mana ɛserɛ so, sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ sɛ: Ɔmaa wɔn paanoo firi soro dii.
Ɛnna Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ: Ɛnyɛ Mose na ɔmaa mo paanoo a ɛfiri soro no, na mmom m’agya na ɔma mo nokorɛ paanoo a ɛfiri soro no.
Na Nyankopɔn paanoo ne deɛ ɔsiane firi soro ba na ɔma wiase nkwa no.

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔsee no sɛ: Awurade, ma yɛn paanoo yi daa!
Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mene nkwa paanoo no; deɛ ɔba me nkyɛn no, ɛkɔm renne no da, na deɛ ɔgye me die no, osukɔm renne no da.
Na meka mekyerɛɛ mo sɛ moahu me, nanso moda so ara nnye nni.
Wɔn a Agya no de wɔn ma me nyinaa bɛba me nkyɛn; na deɛ ɔba me nkyɛn no, merento no ntwene da,
ɛfiri sɛ mesiane mefiri soro mebae, ɛnyɛ sɛ merebɛyɛ deɛ me ara mepɛ, na mmom deɛ ɔsomaa me no apɛdeɛ.
Na yei ne deɛ ɔsomaa me no apɛdeɛ, sɛ deɛ ɔde ama me nyinaa, memmma emu bi nnyera, na manyane no ɛda a ɛdi akyire no.
Na yei ne m’Agya no apɛdeɛ, sɛ obiara a ɔhunu Ɔba no na ɔgye no die no nnya daa nkwa; na mɛnyane no ɛda a ɛdi akyire no.

verse.content: Ɛnna Yudafoɔ no nwiinwii ne ho sɛ waka sɛ:

wj.content: Mene paanoo a ɛsiane firii soro no,

verse.content: na wɔkaa sɛ: Ɛnyɛ oyi ne Yesu, Yosef ba a yɛnim n’agya ne ne na no? Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na afei ɔse: Masiane mafiri soro maba?
Ɛnna Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monnnwiinwii mo mu!
Obi ntumi mma me nkyɛn gye sɛ Agya a ɔsomaa me no twe no; na me deɛ, mɛnyane no ɛda a ɛdi akyire no.
Wɔatwerɛ no adiyifoɔ no mu sɛ: Wɔn nyinaa bɛyɛ nnipa a Onyankopɔn akyerɛkyerɛ wɔn. Obiara a wate afiri Agya no nkyɛn na wasua no na ɔba me nkyɛn.
Ɛnyɛ sɛ obi ahunu Agya no, gye deɛ ɔwɔ Nyankopɔn nkyɛn no, ɔno na wahunu Agya no.
Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ: Deɛ ɔgye die no wɔ daa nkwa.
Mene nkwa paanoo no.
Mo agyanom dii mana ɛserɛ so, na wɔwuwuiɛ;
yei ne paanoo a ɛsiane firi soro ba, sɛ onipa nni bi, na wanwu.
Mene paanoo a nkwa wɔ mu a mesiane mefirii soro mebaeɛ no; sɛ obi di paanoo yi bi a, ɔbɛtena ase daa. Na paanoo a mede bɛma wiase nkwa no ne me honam.

verse.content: Ɛnna Yudafoɔ no yɛɛ akasakasa wɔn mu sɛ: Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na oyi bɛtumi de ne honam ama yɛn na yɛadie?
Ɛnna Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ: Sɛ moanni Onipa Ba no honam, na moannom ne mogya a, monni nkwa mo mu.
Deɛ ɔdi me honam na ɔnom me mogya no wɔ daa nkwa, na mɛnyane no ɛda a ɛdi akyire no.
Na me honam yɛ aduane ampa, na me mogya yɛ anonneɛ ampa.
Deɛ ɔdi me honam na ɔnom me mogya no tena me mu, na me nso metena ne mu.
Sɛdeɛ Agya a ɔte aseɛ no somaa me na Agya no nti mete aseɛ no, saa ara nso na deɛ ɔdi me honam no nso, me nti ɔbɛtena aseɛ.
Yei ne paanoo a ɛfiri soro siane baeɛ no, ɛnte sɛ deɛ mo agyanom diiɛ, na wɔwuwuiɛ no; deɛ ɔdi paanoo yi bɛtena ase daa.

verse.content: Ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ Kapernaum hyiadan mu no na ɔkaa yeinom.
Enti n’asuafoɔ no mu pii teeɛ no, wɔkaa sɛ: Asɛm yi yɛ den, hwan na ɔbɛtumi atie?
Na Yesu tee nka wɔ ne mu sɛ n’asuafoɔ renwiinwii yei ho no, ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Yei to mo suntidua anaa?
Na afei, sɛ mohunu Onipa Ba no sɛ ɔrekɔ soro, faako a ɔwɔ kane no nso ɛ?
Honhom ne deɛ ɛma nkwa, ɔhonam deɛ, ɛnyɛ hwee; nsɛm a maka mo no yɛ honhom ne nkwa.
Na mo mu binom wɔ hɔ a wɔnnye nnie.

verse.content: Na Yesu nim wɔn a wɔnnye nnie no firi mfitiaseɛ, ne deɛ ɔbɛyi no ama no.
Na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Yei nti na maka makyerɛ mo sɛ: Obiara ntumi mma me nkyɛn, gye sɛ Agya no de ama no ansa.

verse.content: Ɛfiri ɛno soɔ no, n’asuafoɔ mu pii sanee wɔn akyiri, na wɔne no annante bio.
Ɛnna Yesu see dummienu no sɛ:

wj.content: Mo nso, mopɛ sɛ mokɔ bi anaa?

verse.content: Simon Petro buaa no sɛ: Awurade, hwan nkyɛn na yɛbɛkorɔ? Wo na wowɔ daa nkwa nsɛm;
na yɛagye adi, na yɛahunu sɛ wone Nyankopɔn Kronkronni no.
Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛnyɛ me na mayi mo dummienu yi anaa? Nso mo mu baako yɛ ɔbonsam!

verse.content: Ɔne Yuda Iskariot, Simon ba; na ɔno na ɔrebɛyi no ama, nso ɔyɛ dummienu no mu baako.
Na yeinom akyiri no, Yesu kyinii Galilea; na ɔmpɛ sɛ ɔkyini Yudea, ɛfiri sɛ na Yudafoɔ no rehwehwɛ no akum no.
Na Yudafoɔ Asesebɔ afahyɛ abɛn.
Ɛnna ne nuanom ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Firi ha kɔ Yudea, na w’asuafoɔ nso nhunu wo nnwuma a woyɛ no.
Na obi nyɛ biribi kokoam nhwehwɛ sɛ wɔbɛhu no badwa mu. Sɛ woyɛ yeinom a, yi wo ho kyerɛ wiase!
Na ne nuanom mpo annye no anni.
Ɛnna Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Me deɛ, me berɛ nnya nnurui, na mo berɛ deɛ, ɛduru daa.
Wiase ntumi ntane mo; na me na ɛtane me, ɛfiri sɛ, medi adanseɛ sɛ, ne nnwuma yɛ bɔne.
Mo deɛ, monkɔ afahyɛ yi ase. Me deɛ, mennya menkɔɔ afahyɛ yi ase; ɛfiri sɛ me berɛ nnya nnurui.

verse.content: Na ɔsee wɔn saa no, ɔtenaa Galilea.
Na ne nuanom kɔeɛ no, ɛnna ɔno nso kɔɔ afahyɛ no aseɛ; wanyi ne ho adi, na mmom ɔhuntae.
Ɛnna Yudafoɔ no hwehwɛɛ no afahyɛ no aseɛ, na wɔse: Ɔwɔ he?
Na huhuhuhu bebree aba nkurɔfoɔ akuakuo no mu wɔ ne ho. Ebinom se: Ɔyɛ onipa pa; na ebinom se: Dabi, na ɔdaadaa nkurɔfoɔ mmom.
Nanso Yudafoɔ no ho hu nti, obi anyi anim anka ne ho asɛm pefee.
Na afahyɛ no mfimfini no, Yesu kɔɔ asɔrefie kɔkyerɛkyerɛeɛ.
Na ɛyɛɛ Yudafoɔ no nwanwa, na wɔse: Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na oyi nsuaa nwoma pɛn, na ɔnim yi?
Yesu buaa wɔn kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Me nkyerɛkyerɛ nyɛ me dea, na deɛ ɔsomaa me no dea.
Sɛ obi pɛ sɛ ɔyɛ n’apɛdeɛ a, ɔbɛhunu sɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ no firi Onyankopɔn anaasɛ ɛfiri me ara me tirim na meka.
Deɛ ɔbɔ ɔno ara ne tirim kasa no, hwehwɛ ɔno ara animuonyam; na deɛ ɔhwehwɛ deɛ ɔsomaa no no animuonyam no, ɔno na ɔyɛ ɔnokwafoɔ a, deɛ ɛntene nni ne mu.
Ɛnyɛ Mose na ɔmaa mo mmara no? Nanso mo mu biara nni mmara no so. Adɛn na morehwehwɛ me aku me?

verse.content: Nkurɔfokuo no buaa sɛ: Wowɔ honhommɔne; hwan na ɔrehwehwɛ wo aku woɔ?
Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mayɛ adwuma baako, na yei na ɛyɛ mo nyinaa nwanwa.
Mose maa mo twetiatwa (ɛnyɛ sɛ ɛfiri Mose, na ɛfiri agyanom) nanso homeda motwa onipa twetia.
Sɛ onipa nya twetiatwa homeda na wɔanto Mose mmara no a, adɛn nti na mo bo afu me sɛ mama onipa mu ho ayɛ no den homeda?
Mommmu atɛn sɛdeɛ mohunu kwa, na mommu atɛn a ɛtene!

verse.content: Ɛnna Yerusalemfoɔ no mu bi kaa sɛ: Ɛnyɛ oyi ne deɛ wɔrehwehwɛ no aku no no?
Na hwɛ ɔkasa pefee, na wɔnka no hwee. Sɛsɛɛ mpanimfoɔ ahunu ampa sɛ oyi ne Kristo no anaa?
Nanso oyi deɛ, yɛnim deɛ ɔfire; na Kristo no deɛ, sɛ ɔba a, obi renhunu deɛ ɔfire.
Ɛnna Yesu rekyerɛkyerɛ asɔrefie no, ɔteaa mu sɛ:

wj.content: Monim me, na monim deɛ mefire. Na ɛnyɛ me ara na mehyɛɛ me ho mebaeɛ; na deɛ ɔsomaa me no yɛ ɔnokwafoɔ a monnim no.
Na me deɛ, menim no; ɛfiri sɛ mefiri ne nkyɛn, na ɔno na ɔsomaa me.

verse.content: Enti na anka wɔrehwehwɛ no akye no; nanso obiara amfa ne nsa anka no, ɛfiri sɛ na ne dɔn nnya nnuruiɛ.
Na nkurɔfokuo no mu pii gyee no dii, na wɔkaa sɛ: Kristo no, sɛ ɔba a, ɔbɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ bebree asene yeinom a oyi ayɛ yi?
Farisifoɔ no tee sɛ nkurɔfokuo no rewiinwii keka yeinom wɔ ne ho. Na Farisifoɔ ne asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ no somaa asomfoɔ sɛ wɔnkɔkye no.
Ɛnna Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mewɔ mo nkyɛn berɛ tiaa bi, na merebɛkɔ deɛ ɔsomaa me no nkyɛn.
Mobɛhwehwɛ me, na morenhu me; na deɛ mewɔ no, mo deɛ, montumi mma hɔ.

verse.content: Ɛnna Yudafoɔ no sesee wɔn ho sɛ: Ɛhe na oyi rebɛkorɔ a yɛrenhu no? Ɔrebɛkɔ wɔn a wɔapete Helafoɔ mu no mu akɔkyerɛkyerɛ Helafoɔ?
Asɛm bɛn na ɔka yi sɛ:

wj.content: Mobɛhwehwɛ me, na morenhu me, na deɛ mewɔ no, mo deɛ, montumi mma hɔ.

verse.content: Na da a ɛdi akyire a ɛyɛ afahyɛ no mu da kɛseɛ no, Yesu sɔre gyinae, na ɔteaa mu sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ osukɔm de obi a, ɔmmra me nkyɛn, mmɛnom nsuo!
Sɛdeɛ atwerɛsɛm no kaeɛ no: Deɛ ɔgye me die no, nkwa asubɔnten bɛsene afiri ne yam.

verse.content: Na yei deɛ, ɔkaa wɔ Honhom a wɔn a wɔgye no die rebɛnya no ho; na Honhom no nnya mmae, ɛfiri sɛ wɔnnya nhyɛɛ Yesu animuonyam.
Na nkurɔfokuo no tee nsɛm yi no, wɔn mu binom kaa sɛ: Odiyifoɔ no nie ampa!
Ebinom se: Kristo no nie! Na ebinom nso bisaa sɛ: Kristo no bɛfiri Galilea anaa?
Atwerɛsɛm no anka sɛ Dawid asefoɔ mu ne Betlehem kuro a Dawid tenaa hɔ no mu na Kristo no bɛfire anaa?
Na ne nti mpaepaemu baa nkurɔfokuo no mu.
Na wɔn mu binom pɛɛ sɛ wɔkye no; nanso obiara amfa ne nsa anka no.
Ɛnna asomfoɔ no baa asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ no nkyɛn, na wɔbɛbisaa wɔn sɛ: Adɛn nti na moamfa no amma?
Asomfoɔ no buaa sɛ: Onipa biara nkasaa sɛ onipa yi da.
Ɛnna Farisifoɔ no buaa wɔn sɛ: Wɔadaadaa mo nso anaa?
Mpanimfoɔ anaa Farisifoɔ no mu bi agye no adi anaa?
Na nkurɔfokuo yi a wɔnnim mmara no, wɔadome wɔn!
Nikodemo a ɔbaa ne nkyɛn da bi a ɔyɛ wɔn mu baako no see wɔn sɛ:
Yɛn mmara ntiee onipa na ɛnhunuu deɛ ɔyɛeɛ ansa a, ɛbu no atɛn anaa?
Wɔbua see no sɛ: Dabrɛ wo nso wofiri Galilea? Hwehwɛ mu, na wobɛhunu sɛ odiyifoɔ nsɔree wɔ Galilea pɛn.
[Na wɔn nyinaa kokɔɔ wɔn afie mu mmaako mmaako.
Na Yesu kɔɔ Ngo Bepɔ no so.
Na ahemadakye no, ɔbaa asɔrefie bio, na ɔman mu no nyinaa baa ne nkyɛn; na ɔtenaa ase kyerɛkyerɛɛ wɔn.
Na Atwerɛfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ no de ɔbaa bi a wɔakye no adwamammɔ mu bae; na wɔde no bɛgyinaa mfimfini no,
wɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ, wɔakyere ɔbaa yi wɔ adwamammɔ mu pɛɛ.
Nso Mose hyɛɛ yɛn mmara no mu sɛ, wɔnsi nnipa a ɛte saa aboɔ; na wo nso, wose sɛn?
Na yei deɛ, wɔka de sɔɔ no hwɛe, na wɔanya biribi akɔtoto n’ano. Na Yesu brɛɛ ne mu ase, de ne nsateaa twerɛtwerɛɛ fam.
Na wɔda so ara rebisa no no, ɔmaa ne mu so see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mo mu deɛ bɔne nni ne ho no, ma no nto no ɛboɔ kane!

verse.content: Na ɔbrɛɛ ne mu ase bio, twerɛtwerɛɛ fam.
Na wɔn deɛ, wɔteeɛ, na wɔn ahonim buu wɔn atɛn no, wɔfirii adi mmaako mmaako firi mpanimfoɔ so bɛsii wɔn a wɔdi akyire so; na ɛkaa Yesu nko ne ɔbaa a ɔgyina mfimfini no.
Na Yesu maa ne mu soɔ, na wanhunu obiara sɛ ɔbaa no nko no, ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔbaa, ɛhe na w’atoafoɔ no wɔ? Obi ammu wo fɔ anaa?

verse.content: Na ɔse: Obi ammu me fɔ, Owura. Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Me nso memmu wo fɔ, kɔ na nkɔyɛ bɔne bio!
Ɛnna Yesu kasa kyerɛɛ wɔn bio sɛ: Mene wiase hann; deɛ ɔdi m’akyire no rennante sum mu da, na ɔbɛnya nkwa hann.

verse.content: Ɛnna Farisifoɔ no see no sɛ: Wo deɛ, wodi wo ara wo ho adanseɛ; w’adanseɛ no nyɛ nokorɛ.
Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ medi me ara me ho adanseɛ mpo a, m’adanseɛ no yɛ nokorɛ, ɛfiri sɛ, menim faako a mefire ne faako a merekorɔ; na mo deɛ, monnim deɛ mefire ne deɛ merekorɔ.
Mo deɛ, mobu ɔhonam ani atɛn; na me deɛ, memmu obiara atɛn.
Na sɛ mebu atɛn mpo a, m’atemmuo no yɛ nokorɛ; ɛfiri sɛ ɛnyɛ me nko ara na mebu atɛn, na mmom me ne Agya no a ɔsomaa me no.
Na wɔatwerɛ no mo mmara nwoma no mu nso sɛ: Nnipa baanu adanseɛ yɛ nokorɛ.
Me na medi me ho adanseɛ, na Agya a ɔsomaa me no nso di me ho adanseɛ.

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔsee no sɛ: Ɛhe na w’Agya wɔ? Yesu buaa sɛ:

wj.content: Monnim me, na monnim m’Agya nso; sɛ monim me a, anka monim m’Agya no nso.

verse.content: Ɔrekyerɛkyerɛ asɔrefie no, na ɔkaa nsɛm yi sikakorabea hɔ; na obi ankye no, ɛfiri sɛ na ne dɔn nnya nnuruiɛ.
Ɛnna ɔsee wɔn bio sɛ:

wj.content: Me deɛ, merekɔ, na mobɛhwehwɛ me, na mobɛwu mo bɔne mu; na faako a merekorɔ no, mo deɛ, montumi mma hɔ.

verse.content: Ɛnna Yudafoɔ no kaa sɛ: Ɔrebɛdi ne ho awu anaa, enti na ɔse:

wj.content: Faako a merekorɔ no, mo deɛ, montumi mma hɔ?

verse.content: Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mo deɛ, mofiri fam, na me deɛ, mefiri soro. Mofiri wiase; na me deɛ, memfiri wiase yi mu.
Enti mese mo sɛ: Mobɛwu mo bɔne mu; na sɛ moannye anni sɛ mene no a, mobɛwu mo bɔne mu.

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔsee no sɛ: Wone hwan? Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Deɛ mefiri mfitiaseɛ meka mekyerɛɛ mo no a.
Mewɔ mo ho nsɛm pii a mɛka, na mabu atɛn; na deɛ ɔsomaa me no yɛ nokwafoɔ. Na deɛ metee no ne nkyɛn no, ɛno na meka mekyerɛ wiase.

verse.content: Wɔanhunu sɛ Agya no ho asɛm na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn.
Ɛnna Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ monya ma Onipa Ba no so a, ɛno na mobɛhunu sɛ mene no, na memmɔ me ara me tirim menyɛ biribi, na sɛdeɛ Agya no kyerɛkyerɛ me no, ɛno saa na meka.
Na deɛ ɔsomaa me no ka me ho; ɔnnyaa me nko, ɛfiri sɛ, meyɛ deɛ ɛsɔ n’ani daa.

verse.content: Ɔrekasa saa no, nnipa pii gyee no dii.
Ɛnna Yesu see Yudafoɔ a wɔagye no adie no sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ motena m’asɛm mu a, moyɛ m’asuafoɔ ampa;
na mobɛhunu nokorɛ no, na nokorɛ no ayɛ mo adehyeɛ.

verse.content: Wɔbuaa no sɛ: Abraham asefoɔ ne yɛn, na yɛnyɛɛ obi nkoa da; ɛyɛɛ dɛn na woka sɛ: Mobɛyɛ adehyeɛ?
Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ, obiara a ɔyɛ bɔne no yɛ bɔne no akoa.
Na akoa nka fie daa; na ɔba deɛ, ɔtena hɔ daa.
Enti sɛ Ɔba no yɛ mo adehyeɛ a, mobɛyɛ adehyeɛ ampa.
Menim sɛ moyɛ Abraham asefoɔ; nanso mohwehwɛ me aku me, ɛfiri sɛ m’asɛm nsene mo mu.
Deɛ mahunu no Agya no nkyɛn na meka, na mo deɛ moyɛ deɛ moate no mo agya no nkyɛn.

verse.content: Wɔbua see no sɛ: Yɛn agya ne Abraham. Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ moyɛ Abraham mma a, anka mobɛyɛ Abraham nnwuma;
na afei morehwehwɛ me aku me, me a maka mo nokorɛ a mate no Nyankopɔn nkyɛn no. Yei deɛ, Abraham anyɛ saa.
Moyɛ mo agya nnwuma.

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔsee no sɛ: Wɔanwo yɛn adwamammɔ mu; Agya baako na yɛwɔ, ɔno ne Onyankopɔn.
Ɛnna Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ mo Agya ne Onyankopɔn a, anka mobɛdɔ me; na me deɛ, mefiri Nyankopɔn mu na mebaeɛ. Nanso ɛnyɛ me na mehyɛɛ me ho mebaeɛ, na ɔno na ɔsomaa me.
Adɛn nti na monte me kasa aseɛ? Ɛfiri sɛ montumi ntie m’asɛm.

Mo deɛ, mo agya a mofiri ne mu ne ɔbonsam, na mo agya no akɔnnɔdeɛ na mopɛ sɛ moyɛ. Ɔno na ɔyɛ owudifoɔ firi mfitiaseɛ, na ɔnnyina nokorɛ so; ɛfiri sɛ nokorɛ nni ne mu. Sɛ ɔka atorosɛm a, ɛfiri ɔno ara ne mu na ɔka; ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ ɔtorofoɔ ne atorɔ agya.
Na me deɛ, ɛsiane sɛ meka nokorɛ nti, monnye me nni.
Mo mu hwan na ɔbu me bɔne bi ho atɛn? Na sɛ meka nokorɛ a, adɛn nti na monnye me nnie?
Deɛ ɔfiri Nyankopɔn mu no tie Nyankopɔn asɛm; deɛ enti montie wɔn ne sɛ, momfiri Nyankopɔn mu.

verse.content: Ɛnna Yudafoɔ no bua see no sɛ: Yɛanka ampa sɛ, woyɛ Samariani na wowɔ honhommɔne?
Yesu buaa sɛ:

wj.content: Me deɛ, menni honhommɔne; na medi m’Agya no ni, na mo deɛ, mohyɛ me ahohora.
Me deɛ, menhwehwɛ me ara m’animuonyam; obi wɔ hɔ a ɔhwehwɛ na ɔbu atɛn.
Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ, obi di m’asɛm so a, ɔrenhunu owuo ara da.

verse.content: Ɛnna Yudafoɔ no see no sɛ: Afei na yɛahunu sɛ wowɔ honhommɔne. Abraham ne adiyifoɔ no wuwui, na wo deɛ, wose: Sɛ obi di m’asɛm so a, ɔrenka owuo nhwɛ ara da.
Woyɛ kɛseɛ sene yɛn agya Abraham a ɔwuiɛ no anaa? Na adiyifoɔ no nso wui a; ɛnneɛ na woreyɛ wo ho hwan ni?
Yesu buaa sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ mehyɛ me ho animuonyam a, m’animuonyam no nyɛ hwee: Ɛyɛ m’Agya a moka sɛ ɔne mo Nyankopɔn no na ɔhyɛ me animuonyam.
Nso moanhu no, na me deɛ, menim no; na sɛ meka sɛ mennim no a, meyɛ ɔtorofoɔ te sɛ mo. Nanso menim no, na medi n’asɛm so.
Mo agya Abraham ho sanee no sɛ ɔbɛhu me da; na ɔhunui, na n’ani gyee.

verse.content: Ɛnna Yudafoɔ no see no sɛ: Wonnya nnii mfirinhyia aduonum mpo, na ɛyɛɛ dɛn na wohunuu Abraham?
Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ, Abraham nnya mmaeɛ no, na mewɔ hɔ.

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔtasee aboɔ sɛ wɔbɛto abɔ no, na Yesu huntae, na ɔfiri asɔrefie hɔ kɔe.

note.content: Tete atwerɛfoɔ a wɔgye wɔn to mu binom mfa yei nka ho.

verse.content: Na ɔretwam no, ɔhunuu onipa bi a n’ani afira firi n’awoɔ mu.
Na n’asuafoɔ bisaa no sɛ: Rabi, hwan na ɔyɛɛ bɔne, oyi anaa n’awofoɔ, sɛ wɔwoo no onifirani yi?
Yesu buaa sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛnyɛ oyi, anaa n’awofoɔ na wɔyɛɛ bɔne, na mmom sɛ Nyankopɔn nnwuma bɛda adi wɔ ne mu ntira.
Ɛsɛ yɛn sɛ adekyeeɛ wɔ hɔ yi, yɛyɛ deɛ ɔsomaa me no nnwuma; anadwo reba a obiara ntumi nyɛ adwuma.
Mewɔ wiase yi, mene wiase hann.

verse.content: Ɔkaa saa no, ɔtoo ntasuo guu fam, na ɔde ntasuo no fraa dɔteɛ, na ɔde dɔteɛ no sraa onifirani no aniwa so,
na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ:

wj.content: Kɔ, kɔhohoro so wɔ Ɔtadeɛ Siloa mu

verse.content: (ne nkyerɛaseɛ ne: Deɛ wɔasoma no). Ɛnna ɔsii mu kɔeɛ kɔhohoroo soɔ, na ɔbaeɛ, na ɔhunu adeɛ.
Ɛnna amannifoɔ ne wɔn a kane wɔhunuu no sɛ ɔyɛ ɔsrɛsrɛfoɔ no kaa sɛ: Ɛnyɛ oyi na na ɔte hɔ srɛsrɛ adeɛ no?
Ebinom se: Ɔno ni! Na ebinom nso se: Ɔsɛ no. Na ɔno ara se: Mene no.
Ɛnna wɔbisaa no sɛ: Ɛyɛɛ dɛn na w’ani bueeɛ?
Ɔbua kaa sɛ: Onipa bi a wɔfrɛ no Yesu na ɔpɔtɔɔ dɔteɛ de sraa m’ani soɔ, na ɔka kyerɛɛ me sɛ: Kɔ Ɔtadeɛ Siloa mu kɔhohoro so. Na mekɔ mekɔhohoroo soɔ no, na mehunuu adeɛ.
Ɛnna wɔbisaa no sɛ: Ɔwɔ he? Ɔse: Mennim.
Wɔde deɛ anka ɔyɛ onifirani no kɔɔ Farisifoɔ nkyɛn.
Nso da a Yesu pɔtɔɔ dɔteɛ na ɔbuee n’ani no yɛ homeda.
Ɛnna Farisifoɔ no nso bisaa no bio sɛdeɛ ɛyɛeɛ na ɔhunuu adeɛ. Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ: Dɔteɛ na ɔde sraa m’ani soɔ, na mekɔhohoroo soɔ, na mehunu adeɛ yi.
Ɛnna Farisifoɔ no mu bi kaa sɛ: Onipa yi mfiri Nyankopɔn nkyɛn, ɛfiri sɛ, ɔnni homeda. Ebinom se: Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na onipa debɔneyɛni bɛtumi ayɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ a ɛte seyie? Na mpaepaemu baa wɔn mu.
Ɛnna wɔsee onifirani no bio sɛ: Wo deɛ, woka deɛn ne ho, sɛ ɔbuee w’ani no? Na ɔse: Ɔyɛ odiyifoɔ.
Nso na Yudafoɔ no nnye ne ho nsɛm no nni, sɛ anka ɔyɛ onifirani na ɔhunuu adeɛ, de kɔsii sɛ wɔfrɛɛ deɛ ɔhunuu adeɛ no awofoɔ,
na wɔbisaa wɔn sɛ: Mo ba a moka sɛ wɔwoo no onifirani no ni anaa? Afei ɛyɛɛ dɛn na ɔhunu adeɛ yi?
N’awofoɔ buaa wɔn kaa sɛ: Yɛnim sɛ yɛn ba ni, na wɔwoo no onifirani;
na sɛ ɛyɛeɛ na afei ɔhunu adeɛ yi deɛ, yɛnnim. Na bio nso onipa korɔ a ɔbuee n’ani no, yɛn deɛ, yɛnnim; mommisa no, wanyini, na ɔno ara bɛkasa ama ne ho.
N’awofoɔ kaa yei, ɛfiri sɛ na wɔsuro Yudafoɔ no; na Yudafoɔ no apam dada sɛ, sɛ obi pae mu ka sɛ ɔno ne Kristo no a, wɔbɛtu no afiri hyiadan mu.
Yei nti na n’awofoɔ kaa sɛ: Wanyini, mommisa no.
Ɛnna wɔfrɛɛ onipa a anka ɔyɛ onifirani no ne mprenu soɔ, na wɔsee no sɛ: Fa animuonyam ma Onyankopɔn! Yɛn deɛ, yɛnim sɛ onipa yi yɛ ɔdebɔneyɛni.
Ɛnna ɔbua kaa sɛ: Sɛ ɔyɛ ɔdebɔneyɛni a, mennim; adeɛ baako na menim, sɛ na anka meyɛ onifirani, na afei deɛ mehunu adeɛ.
Na wɔsee no sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na ɔyɛɛ woɔ? Ɔbuee w’ani no sɛn?
Ɔbuaa wɔn sɛ: Maka makyerɛ mo dada, na moante? Ɛdeɛn na mopɛ sɛ mote bio? Mo nso mopɛ sɛ modane n’asuafoɔ anaa?
Wɔyaa no, na wɔkaa sɛ: Wo na woyɛ ne suani; na yɛn deɛ, Mose asuafoɔ ne yɛn.
Yɛnim sɛ Onyankopɔn kasa kyerɛɛ Mose; na oyi deɛ, yɛnnim faako a ɔfire.
Onipa no bua see wɔn sɛ: Yei na ɛyɛ nwanwa, sɛ monnim faako a ɔfire, nanso ɔbuee m’ani.
Na yɛnim sɛ Onyankopɔn ntie adebɔneyɛfoɔ; na sɛ obi fɛre Onyankopɔn na ɔyɛ deɛ ɔpɛ a, ɔno na ɔtie no.
Ɛfiri wiase mfitiaseɛ, wɔntee sɛ obi abue deɛ wɔwoo no onifirani ani pɛn.
Sɛ oyi mfiri Nyankopɔn nkyɛn a, anka ɔrentumi nyɛ hwee.
Wɔbua see no sɛ: Wo deɛ, bɔne mu koraa na wɔwoo woɔ, na wo na wokyerɛkyerɛ yɛn? Na wɔpamm no firii adi.
Yesu tee sɛ wɔapam no afiri adie; na ɔhunuu no no, ɔbisaa sɛ:

wj.content: Wogye Onipa Ba no di anaa?

verse.content: Ɔbuaa sɛ: Hwan ne no, Owura, na mennye no menni?
Na Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Woahu no, na deɛ ɔne wo rekasa yi, ɔne no.

verse.content: Na ɔse: Megye medi, Awurade! Na ɔkoto sɔree no.
Na Yesu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Atemmuo nti na mebaa wiase, na wɔn a wɔnhunu adeɛ no ahunu, na wɔn a wɔhunu adeɛ no adane anifirafoɔ.

verse.content: Na Farisifoɔ no mu bi a wɔne no wɔ hɔ no tee nsɛm yi, na wɔsee no sɛ: Na yɛn nso yɛyɛ anifirafoɔ?
Yesu bua see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ moyɛ anifirafoɔ a, anka monni bɔne; na sɛ mose: Yɛhunu adeɛ enti, na mo bɔne aka.
Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ, deɛ ɔmfa ɛpono ano nkɔ nnwammuo mu na ɔforo fa baabi no, ɔyɛ owifoɔ ne odwotwafoɔ;
na deɛ ɔfa ɛpono ano kɔ mu no ne nnwan no hwɛfoɔ.
Ɔno na ɛponoanohwɛfoɔ hini ma no, na nnwan no te ne nne, na ɔbɔ ɔno ara ne nnwan din frɛ wɔn firi adi.
Na ɔma ɔno ara ne nnwan firi adi a, ɔdi wɔn anim; na nnwan no di n’akyi, ɛfiri sɛ wɔnim ne nne.
Na ɔhɔhoɔ deɛ, wɔrenni n’akyi, na wɔbɛdwane no; ɛfiri sɛ wɔnnim ananafoɔ nne.

verse.content: Yesu de bɛ yi buu wɔn; na wɔn deɛ, wɔanhunu asɛm ko a ɔkaa wɔn no.
Ɛnna Yesu see wɔn bio sɛ:

wj.content: Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ: Mene nnwan no pono no.
Wɔn a wɔdii m’anim baeɛ no nyinaa yɛ awifoɔ ne adwotwafoɔ; na nnwan no antie wɔn.
Mene ɛpono no; sɛ obi fa me so kɔ mu a, wɔbɛgye no nkwa, na ɔbɛkɔ mu, na ɔbɛfiri adi, na ɔbɛnya adidibea.
Owifoɔ mma, gye sɛ ɔrebɛwia na wakum na wasɛe; me deɛ, mebae, na wɔanya nkwa, na wɔanya no mmorosoɔ.
Mene odwanhwɛfoɔ pa no. Odwanhwɛfoɔ pa de ne nkwa to hɔ ma nnwan no;
na ɔpaani a ɔnyɛ odwanhwɛfoɔ, na nnwan no nyɛ ne dea no hunu pataku sɛ ɔreba a, ɔgya nnwan no hɔ dwane; na pataku no bɛkye wɔn bɔ wɔn hwete.
Na ɔpaani dwane, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ ɔpaani, na ɔnnwene nnwan no ho.
Mene odwanhwɛfoɔ pa no; na menim me deɛ, na me deɛ nso nim me,
sɛdeɛ Agya no nim me, na me nso menim Agya no. Na mede me nkwa meto hɔ mema nnwan no.
Na mewɔ nnwan foforɔ a wɔmfiri ban yi mu; wɔn nso na ɛtwa sɛ mede wɔn meba, na wɔbɛtie me nne, na ayɛ kuo baako ne ɔhwɛfoɔ baako.
Yei nti na Agya no dɔ me, ɛfiri sɛ mede me nkwa meto hɔ, na mafa bio.
Obi nnye me nsam, na me ara na mede meto hɔ; na mewɔ ho kwan sɛ mede meto hɔ, na mewɔ ho kwan sɛ mefa bio; ahyɛdeɛ yi na menyaa no m’Agya nkyɛn.

verse.content: Ɛnna nsɛm yi nti mpaepaemu baa Yudafoɔ no mu bio.
Na wɔn mu bebree kaa sɛ: Ɔwɔ honhommɔne, na wabɔ dam; adɛn nti na motie no?
Ebinom se: Nsɛm yi nyɛ deɛ ɔwɔ honhommɔne nsɛm. Honhommɔne bɛtumi abue anifirafoɔ ani anaa?
Na Asɔrefiedwira afahyɛ adu wɔ Yerusalem, na awɔ berɛ aba.
Na Yesu nenam asɔrefie Salomo abrannaa so.
Ɛnna Yudafoɔ bɛtwaa ne ho hyiaeɛ, na wɔsee no sɛ: Wobɛma yɛatwɛn akɔsi da bɛn? Sɛ wone Kristo no a, pae mu ka kyerɛ yɛn pefee?
Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Maka makyerɛ mo, na monnye nni; nnwuma a meyɛ no m’Agya din mu no, ɛno na ɛdi me ho adanseɛ.
Na mo deɛ, monnye nni; ɛfiri sɛ momfiri me nnwan no mu.
Me nnwan tie me nne, na me nso menim wɔn, na wɔdi m’akyi;
na mema wɔn daa nkwa, na wɔrenyera, na obi renhwim wɔn mfiri me nsam da.
M’Agya a ɔde wɔn maa me no yɛ kɛseɛ sene nnoɔma nyinaa; na obi rentumi nhwim wɔn m’Agya nsam.
Me ne Agya no yɛ baako.

verse.content: Ɛnna Yudafoɔ no tasee aboɔ bio sɛ wɔde rebɛsi no.
Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Nnwuma pa pii na mayɛ makyerɛ mo a ɛfiri Agya no nkyɛn; emu deɛ ɛwɔ he nti na morebɛsi me aboɔ yi?

verse.content: Yudafoɔ no buaa no sɛ: Ɛnyɛ adwuma pa nti na yɛrebɛsi wo aboɔ, na abususɛm ntira, ɛfiri sɛ wo a woyɛ onipa no yɛ wo ho sɛ Onyankopɔn.
Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔntwerɛɛ no mo mmara mu sɛ: Mekaa sɛ: Moyɛ anyame?
Sɛ ɔfrɛɛ wɔn a Nyankopɔn asɛm baa wɔn nkyɛn no anyame na wɔntumi nsɛe atwerɛ no a,
adɛn nti na moka deɛ Agya ayɛ no kronkron, na wasoma no wiase no ho sɛ: Woka abususɛm, ɛnam sɛ mekaa sɛ: Nyankopɔn Ba ne me?
Sɛ menyɛ m’Agya nnwuma a, ɛnneɛ monnnye me nnni;
na sɛ meyɛ, na me deɛ, monnye me nni a, monnye nnwuma no nni, na moahwɛ ahunu sɛ, Agya no wɔ me mu, na me nso mewɔ ne mu.

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔhwehwɛɛ bio sɛ wɔkye no, na ɔfiri wɔn nsa kɔe.
Na ɔsii mu kɔɔ Yordan agya nohoa bio wɔ faako a Yohane bɔɔ asu kane no, na ɔkɔtenaa hɔ.
Na nnipa pii baa ne nkyɛn, na wɔkaa sɛ: Yohane anyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ bi deɛ, nanso nnoɔma a Yohane kaa wɔ oyi ho nyinaa no yɛ nokorɛ.
Na nnipa pii gyee no dii wɔ hɔ.
Na ɔyarefoɔ bi wɔ hɔ a wɔfrɛ no Lasaro a ɔfiri Betania, Maria ne ne nuabaa Marta kuro mu.
Na ɛyɛ Maria a ɔde ngo hwamhwam sraa Awurade na ɔde ne tirinwi pepaa ne nan ho no na ne nua Lasaro yareɛ no.
Enti ne nuammaanom soma baa Yesu nkyɛn sɛ: Awurade, hwɛ, deɛ wodɔ no no yare.
Na Yesu teeɛ no, ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Yadeɛ yi nyɛ owuo yadeɛ, na Nyankopɔn animuonyam ntira, sɛ wɔbɛfa so ahyɛ Nyankopɔn Ba no animuonyam.

verse.content: Nso Yesu dɔ Marta ne ne nuabaa no ne Lasaro.
Na afei ɔtee sɛ ɔyareɛ no, ɔtenaa faako a ɔwɔ hɔ no ara nnanu.
Na ɛno akyiri no, ɔsee n’asuafoɔ no sɛ:

wj.content: Momma yɛnkɔ Yudea bio!

verse.content: Asuafoɔ no see no sɛ: Rabi, nnansa yi ara, na Yudafoɔ rehwehwɛ sɛ wɔsi wo aboɔ, na worekɔ hɔ bio yi?
Yesu buaa sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛnyɛ nnɔnhwereɛ dummienu na ɛwɔ da baako mu? Sɛ obi nam awia a, ɔnsunti, ɛfiri sɛ ɔhunu wiase hann;
na sɛ obi nam anadwo a, ɔsunti, ɛfiri sɛ hann nni ne mu.

verse.content: Ɔkaa yeinom, na ɛno akyiri no, ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Yɛn adamfo Lasaro ada; na merekɔ makɔnyane no.

verse.content: Ɛnna n’asuafoɔ no kaa sɛ: Awurade, sɛ wada deɛ a, ɔbɛsɔre.
Na Yesu deɛ, ɔkaa ne wuo ho asɛm; na wɔn deɛ, wɔsusuu sɛ nna pa ho asɛm na ɔreka.
Ɛnna afei Yesu see wɔn pefee sɛ:

wj.content: Lasaro awu;
na mo nti ɛyɛ me dɛ sɛ menni hɔ, na moagye adi. Nanso momma yɛnkɔ ne nkyɛn!

verse.content: Ɛnna Toma a wɔfrɛ no Ata no ka kyerɛɛ ne mfɛfoɔ asuafoɔ no sɛ: Yɛn nso, momma yɛnkɔ na yɛne no nkɔwu!
Ɛnna Yesu duruu hɔ no, ɔbɛhunuu sɛ wadi ɛda mu nnanan dada.
Nso Betania bɛn Yerusalem, ɛbɛyɛ kwansini mmienu,
na Yudafoɔ no mu pii aba Marta ne Maria nkyɛn sɛ wɔrebɛgyam wɔn, wɔn nua no nti.
Ɛnna Marta tee sɛ Yesu reba no, ɔkɔhyiaa no; na Maria deɛ, ɔtenaa fie.
Ɛnna Marta see Yesu sɛ: Awurade, sɛ wowɔ ha a, anka me nuabarima anwu.
Na seesei mpo menim sɛ, biribiara a wobɛbisa Onyankopɔn no, Onyankopɔn de bɛma wo.
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Wo nuabarima no bɛsɔre bio.

verse.content: Marta see no sɛ: Menim sɛ owusɔreɛ mu, da a ɛdi akyire no, ɔbɛsɔre.
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Mene owusɔreɛ ne nkwa; deɛ ɔgye me die no, sɛ wawu mpo a, ɔbɛnya nkwa.
Na obiara a ɔte ase na ɔgye me die no renwu da. Wogye yei di anaa?

verse.content: Ɔsee no sɛ: Aane, Awurade, megye medi sɛ wone Kristo no, Nyankopɔn Ba a ɔreba wiase no.
Na ɔkaa saa no, ɔsii mu kɔfrɛɛ ne nua Maria kokoam sɛ: Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no aba, na ɔrefrɛ wo.
Ɔno nso teeɛ no, ɔsɔree ntɛm baa ne nkyɛn.
Nanso na Yesu nnya nhyɛnee kuro no mu, na ɔwɔ deɛ Marta bɛhyiaa no hɔ.
Ɛnna Yudafoɔ a wɔne no wɔ efie hɔ regyam no no hunuu sɛ Maria asɔre ntɛmntɛm afiri adie no, wɔdii n’akyi kaa sɛ: Ɔrekɔ ɛda no so hɔ akɔsu.
Ɛnna Maria duruu faako a Yesu wɔ na ɔhunuu no no, ɔhwee ne nan ase ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Awurade, sɛ wowɔ ha a, anka me nuabarima anwu.
Ɛnna Yesu hunuu no sɛ ɔresu na Yudafoɔ a wɔne no baeɛ nso resu no, ɔguu ahome honhom mu, na ne ho yeraa no,
na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛhe na mode no toeɛ?

verse.content: Wɔsee no sɛ: Awurade, bra bɛhwɛ!
Yesu sui.
Ɛnna Yudafoɔ no kaa sɛ: Hwɛ dɔ a ɔdɔ no!
Na wɔn mu binom se: Oyi a ɔbuee onifirani ani no, sɛ anka ɔbɛtumi agye oyi afiri wuo mu.
Ɛnna Yesu guu ahome ne mu bio, na ɔbaa ɛda no so; ɛyɛ ɔbodan, na ɔboɔ hini ano.
Yesu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Monyi ɔboɔ no! Deɛ wawuo no nua Marta see no sɛ: Awurade, sɛsɛɛ deɛ, wabɔn, na wadi nnanan.

verse.content: Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Manka mankyerɛ wo sɛ wogye di a, wobɛhunu Nyankopɔn animuonyam?

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔyii ɔboɔ no. Na Yesu maa n’ani so kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Agya, meda wo ase sɛ woatie me.
Na me deɛ, menim sɛ wotie me daa; na nkurɔfokuo a wɔgyina hɔ no nti na meka saa, na wɔagye adi sɛ wo na wosomaa me.

verse.content: Na ɔkaa saa no, ɔde nne kɛseɛ teaa mu sɛ:

wj.content: Lasaro, firi bra!

verse.content: Na deɛ wawuo no firii adi, ɛda no mu, ntoma kyekyere ne nan ne ne nsa, na duku kyekyere n’anim. Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monsane no, na momma no nkɔ.

verse.content: Ɛnna Yudafoɔ no mu pii a wɔbaa Maria nkyɛn na wɔhunuu adeɛ a Yesu yɛeɛ no gyee no diiɛ.
Na wɔn mu binom sii mu kɔɔ Farisifoɔ no nkyɛn, na wɔkɔkaa wɔn deɛ Yesu yɛeɛ no.
Ɛnna asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ no maa wɔkɔhyiaa badwafoɔ no, na wɔkaa sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na yɛbɛyɛ, ɛfiri sɛ onipa yi yɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ pii.
Sɛ yɛgyaa no saa a, nnipa nyinaa bɛgye no adi, na Romafoɔ aba abɛfa yɛn ha yi ne yɛn man.
Na wɔn mu baako bi, Kaiafa a ɔdi sɔfo panin afe no mu no, see wɔn sɛ: Mo deɛ, monnim hwee,
nanso monnwene sɛ ɛyɛ ma mo sɛ onipa baako bɛwu ama ɔman no, na ɔman no nyinaa ansɛe.
Na yei deɛ, ɛmfiri ɔno ara ne tirim na ɔkaeɛ, na mmom sɛ ɔyɛ ɔsɔfo panin saa afe no mu nti, na ɔhyɛɛ nkɔm sɛ Yesu rebɛwu ama ɔman no,
na ɛnyɛ ɔman no nko, na sɛ ɔbɛka Nyankopɔn mma a wɔapete no nyinaa nso abɔ mu ayɛ wɔn baako.
Ɛnna ɛfiri da no ara wɔtutuu agyina wɔn mu sɛ wɔbɛku no.
Enti Yesu anyi ne ho adi pefee annante Yudafoɔ no mu bio, na ɔfirii hɔ kɔɔ asase a ɛbɛn ɛserɛ soɔ, kuro bi a wɔfrɛ no Efraim mu, na ɔne n’asuafoɔ no tenaa hɔ.
Na Yudafoɔ Twam no abɛn; na nnipa pii firii asase no so kɔɔ Yerusalem ansa na Twam no duruiɛ, sɛ wɔrekɔdwira wɔn ho.
Ɛnna wɔhwehwɛɛ Yesu, na wɔgyinaa asɔrefie hɔ sesee wɔn ho sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na mosusuo? Sɛsɛɛ ɔremma afahyɛ yi ase anaa?
Na asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ ahyɛ mmara nso sɛ, sɛ obi nim faako a ɔwɔ a, ɔmmɛkyerɛ, na wɔnkɔkye no.
Afei, aka nnansia na Twam no aduru no, Yesu baa Betania, faako a Lasaro a ɔnyanee no firii awufoɔ mu no wɔ.
Ɛnna wɔtoo no pono wɔ hɔ, na Marta somee; na Lasaro deɛ, na ɔyɛ wɔn a wɔne no te adidiiɛ no mu baako.
Ɛnna Maria faa ngo hwamhwam kronkron a ne boɔ yɛ den kariboɔ baako de bɛsraa Yesu nan ho, na ɔde ne tirinwi pepaa ne nan ho; na ngo no hwam yɛɛ ɛdan no mu ma.
Ɛnna n’asuafoɔ no mu baako, Yuda Iskariot (a ɔrebɛyi no ama no), kaa sɛ:
Adɛn nti na wɔantɔn ngo hwamhwam yi annye denare ahasa, na wɔamfa amma ahiafoɔ?
Ɛnyɛ sɛ ɔdwene ahiafoɔ ho nti na ɔkaa yei, na mmom ɔyɛ owifoɔ, na ɔkura kotokuo no, na ɔwiawia deɛ wɔde gu mu ntira.
Ɛnna Yesu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Monnyaa no, na ɔde yei asie ama me sie da.
Na ahiafoɔ deɛ, mowɔ wɔn mo nkyɛn daa; na me deɛ, monni me daa.

verse.content: Ɛnna Yudafoɔ no mu nkurɔfokuo pii tee sɛ ɔwɔ hɔ, na wɔbae, ɛnyɛ Yesu nko ara ntira, na mmom sɛ wɔbɛhunu Lasaro a ɔnyanee no firii awufoɔ mu no nso ntira.
Na asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ no tuu agyina sɛ wɔbɛkum Lasaro nso,
ɛfiri sɛ, ne nti na Yudafoɔ mu pii kɔeɛ, kɔgyee Yesu diiɛ.
Adeɛ kyeeɛ no, nkurɔfokuo pii a wɔbaa afahyɛ no aseɛ tee sɛ Yesu reba Yerusalem no,
wɔfefaa berɛ, na wɔfirii adi sɛ wɔrekɔhyia no, na wɔteateaa mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Nhyira ne deɛ ɔreba Awurade din mu no,

verse.content: Na Yesu hunuu afunumu ba bi no, ɔtenaa ne so, sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ sɛ:
Nso n’asuafoɔ no anhunu yeinom kane no; na Onyankopɔn hyɛɛ Yesu animuonyam akyiri no, ɛno na wɔkaee sɛ wɔatwerɛ yeinom ne ho, na wɔayɛ ama no.
Ɛnna nkurɔfokuo a wɔne no wɔ hɔ berɛ a ɔfrɛɛ Lasaro firii adakamena mu na ɔnyanee no firii awufoɔ mu no dii adanseɛ.
Yei nti nso na nkurɔfokuo no kɔhyiaa no, ɛfiri sɛ wɔate sɛ wayɛ saa nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ no.
Ɛnna Farisifoɔ no kaa no wɔn mu sɛ: Mohunu sɛ montumi nyɛ ho hwee; hwɛ, wiase atu di n’akyi.
Na Helafoɔ bi wɔ wɔn a wɔbaa sɛ wɔrebɛsɔre afahyɛ no ase no mu;
ɛnna wɔbaa Filipo a ɔfiri Betsaida a ɛwɔ Galilea no nkyɛn, na wɔbɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Owura, yɛpɛ sɛ yɛhunu Yesu.
Filipo ba bɛka kyerɛɛ Andrea, na afei Andrea ne Filipo bɛka kyerɛɛ Yesu.
Na Yesu buaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Dɔn no aduru sɛ wɔbɛhyɛ Onipa Ba no animuonyam.
Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ, ayuo baako antɔ fam anwu a, ɛwɔ hɔ korɔ no ara; na sɛ ɛwu a, ɛso aba pii.
Deɛ ɔdɔ ne kra no, ɛbɛfiri ne nsa; na deɛ ɔtane ne kra wɔ wiase ha yi no, ɔbɛkora no akɔ daa nkwa mu.
Sɛ obi som me a, ma no nni m’akyi, na faako a mewɔ no, ɛhɔ na me somfoɔ nso bɛba; na sɛ obi som me a, m’Agya bɛdi no ni.
Afei me kra ho yera no; na ɛdeɛn na menka? Agya, gye me firi dɔn yi mu! Nanso yei nti na mebaa dɔn yi mu.
Agya, hyɛ wo din animuonyam!

verse.content: Ɛnna ɛnne bi firi soro baeɛ: Mahyɛ no animuonyam dada, na mɛhyɛ no bio.
Ɛnna nkurɔfokuo a wɔgyina hɔ na wɔteeɛ no kaa sɛ: Aprannaa abom! Ebinom se: Ɔbɔfoɔ ne no kasae.
Yesu bua kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛnyɛ me nti na ɛnne yi baeɛ, na mo ntira.
Afei ne wiase atemmuo; afei na wɔbɛyi wiase sodifoɔ no hɔ.
Na me deɛ, sɛ wɔma me so firi asase so a, mɛtwe nnipa nyinaa maba me nkyɛn.

verse.content: Yei deɛ, ɔka de kyerɛɛ owu ko a ɔrebɛwuo.
Nkurɔfokuo no buaa no sɛ: Yɛn deɛ, yɛate no mmara no mu sɛ, Kristo no te hɔ daa; na adɛn na wose:

wj.content: Ɛtwa sɛ wɔma Onipa Ba no soɔ?

verse.content: Hwan ne Onipa Ba yi?
Ɛnna Yesu ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Aka hann no berɛ tiaa bi wɔ mo mu. Mowɔ hann no yi, monnante, na esum ammɛto mo; na deɛ ɔnam sum mu no nnim faako a ɔrekorɔ.
Mowɔ hann no yi, monnye hann no nni, na moayɛ hann no mma.

verse.content: Yesu kaa yeinom, na ɔfiri wɔn anim hɔ kɔhuntaeɛ.
Na wayɛ saa nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ bebree wɔ wɔn anim deɛ, nanso wɔannye no anni,
na Odiyifoɔ Yesaia asɛm a ɔkaeɛ no aba mu sɛ:

block_quote.content: Awurade, hwan na wagye yɛn kaseɛ adie,
na hwan na wɔyii Awurade basa kyerɛɛ no?

verse.content: Yei nti na wɔantumi annye annie, sɛdeɛ Yesaia kaa bio sɛ:

block_quote.content: na wɔamfa wɔn akoma ante aseɛ, na wɔannane wɔn ho

verse.content: Yesaia kaa yeinom, ɛfiri sɛ ɔhunuu n’animuonyam, na ne ho asɛm na ɔkaeɛ.
Na mpanimfoɔ no mu pii nso gyee no diiɛ; nanso Farisifoɔ no nti wɔanka, na wɔantu wɔn amfiri hyiadan mu;
ɛfiri sɛ na wɔpɛ nnipa animuonyam sene Nyankopɔn animuonyam.
Na Yesu teaa mu sɛ:

wj.content: Deɛ ɔgye me die no, ɛnyɛ me na ɔgye me die, na ɛyɛ deɛ ɔsomaa me no;
na deɛ ɔhu me no, hunu deɛ ɔsomaa me no.
Maba wiase sɛ hann, na obiara a ɔgye me die no antena sum mu.
Na sɛ obi te me nsɛm na wannye anni a, me deɛ, memmu no atɛn; na mamma sɛ merebɛbu wiase atɛn, na mebaa sɛ merebɛgye wiase.
Deɛ ɔmmu me, na ɔnnye me nsɛm no wɔ deɛ ɔbu no atɛn; asɛm a maka no, ɛno ara na ɛbɛbu no atɛn ɛda a ɛdi akyire no mu,
ɛfiri sɛ, me deɛ ɛnyɛ me na mehyɛɛ me ho mekasaeɛ, na Agya a ɔsomaa me no na ɔhyɛɛ me deɛ menka ne sɛdeɛ menkasa.
Na menim sɛ, n’ahyɛdeɛ no yɛ daa nkwa. Enti deɛ meka no, sɛdeɛ Agya no aka akyerɛ me no, saa ara na meka.

verse.content: Na Twam afahyɛ no rebɛduru no, na Yesu nim sɛ ne dɔn aduru sɛ ɔrebɛfiri wiase akɔ Agya no nkyɛn, na sɛ ɔdɔɔ ɔno ara ne deɛ a wɔwɔ wiase no, ɔdɔɔ wɔn kɔsii awieeɛ.
Na wɔrebɛdidie no, na ɔbonsam anya de ahyɛ Yuda Iskariot, Simon ba, akoma mu sɛ ɔnkɔyi no mma.
Na Yesu nim sɛ Agya no de nnoɔma nyinaa ahyɛ ne nsa, ɛne sɛ ɔfirii Nyankopɔn nkyɛn, na ɔrekɔ Nyankopɔn nkyɛn nti,
ɔsɔre firii adidiiɛ, na ɔyii n’atadeɛ guu hɔ, na ɔfaa mpepaho de kyekyeree ne ho.
Na afei ɔhwiee nsuo guu dwaresɛn mu, na ɔfirii aseɛ hohoroo asuafoɔ no nan ho, na ɔde mpepaho a ɔde kyekyeree ne ho no pepaa ho.
Ɛnna ɔbɛduruu Simon Petro soɔ; na ɔno deɛ, ɔsee no sɛ: Awurade, wo na worehohoro me nan ho yi?
Yesu bua see no sɛ:

wj.content: Deɛ mereyɛ yi, worente aseɛ seesei, na akyire yi na wobɛte aseɛ.

verse.content: Petro see no sɛ: Meremma wo nhohoro me nan ho da! Yesu buaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ manhohoro wo ho a, wonni m’afa.

verse.content: Simon Petro see no sɛ: Awurade, ɛnyɛ me nan ho nko, na me nsa ne me tirim nso bi.
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Deɛ wadwareɛ no, ɛnhia no adwareɛ, gye ne nan ho hohorɔ, na ne ho nyinaa afi; na mo ho afi, na ɛnyɛ mo nyinaa.

verse.content: Na ɔnim deɛ ɔbɛyi no ama; yei nti na ɔkaa sɛ: Ɛnyɛ mo nyinaa na mo ho afire no.
Ɛnna ɔwiee wɔn nan ho hohorɔ na ɔfaa n’atadeɛ na ɔtenaa ase bio no, ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Moahunu deɛ mayɛ mo yi?
Mo deɛ, mofrɛ me Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ ne Awurade, na moka nokorɛ, na meyɛ.
Afei sɛ me, Awurade ne Kyerɛkyerɛfoɔ no, mahohoro mo nan ho a, na ɛsɛ sɛ mo nso mohohoro mo ho mo ho nan ho.
Na mama mo nhwɛsoɔ sɛ, sɛdeɛ mayɛ mo no, mo nso monyɛ saa ara.
Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ: Akoa nsene ne wura, na ɔsomafoɔ nsene deɛ ɔsomaa no.
Sɛ monim yeinom na moyɛ a, nhyira ne mo.
Ɛnyɛ mo nyinaa ho asɛm na meka; me deɛ, menim wɔn a mayi wɔn. Na saa na ɛbɛyɛ na twerɛsɛm no aba mu sɛ: Deɛ ɔdi me paanoo no na wama ne nantin so atia me.
Afei mese mo ansa na aba, na sɛ ɛnya ba a, moagye adi sɛ mene no.
Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ: Deɛ ɔgye obi a mesomaa no no, ɔgye me; na deɛ ɔgye me no gye deɛ ɔsomaa me no.

verse.content: Yesu kaa saa no, ne ho yeraa no honhom mu, na ɔdii adanseɛ sɛ:

wj.content: Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ: Mo mu baako bɛyi me ama.

verse.content: Ɛnna asuafoɔ no hwehwɛɛ wɔn ho anim, wɔnhunu onii korɔ a ɔne no.
Na asuafoɔ no mu baako a Yesu dɔ no no twere Yesu koko mu;
ɛnna Simon Petro bɔɔ n’ani kyerɛɛ no see no sɛ: Bisa no deɛ ɔreka ne ho asɛm no.
Enti ɔpa tweree Yesu koko mu bisaa no sɛ: Awurade, ɛyɛ hwan a?
Yesu buaa sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔno ne deɛ mede paanoo sini bɛbɔ mu mama no no. Na ɔde paanoo sini no bɔɔ mu maa Yuda, Simon Iskariot ba no.

verse.content: Na ɔgyee paanoo sini no akyiri no, ɛno na Satan hyɛnee ne mu. Ɛnna Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Deɛ woreyɛ no, yɛ no ntɛm!

verse.content: Na yei deɛ, wɔn a wɔte adidiiɛ no mu biara anhunu deɛ enti a ɔkaa saa kyerɛɛ no.
Na ebinom susu sɛ Yuda kura kotokuo no nti, Yesu reka akyerɛ no sɛ: Kɔtotɔ deɛ ɛhia yɛn sie afahyɛ no, anaasɛ ɔmfa biribi mma ahiafoɔ.
Ɛnna ɔgyee paanoo sini no no, ntɛm ara na ɔfirii adie; na ɛyɛ anadwo.
Ɛnna ɔfirii adie no, Yesu kaa sɛ:

wj.content: Afei wɔahyɛ Onipa Ba no animuonyam, na Onyankopɔn anya ne mu animuonyam.
Sɛ Onyankopɔn anya ne mu animuonyam a, Onyankopɔn nso bɛhyɛ no animuonyam ɔno ara ne mu, na ɔbɛhyɛ no animuonyam ntɛm.
Mma nkumaa, berɛ tiaa bi na aka a mene mo wɔ hɔ. Mobɛhwehwɛ me, na sɛdeɛ meka mekyerɛɛ Yudafoɔ no sɛ: Faako a merekorɔ no, mo deɛ, montumi mma hɔ no, saa ara na afei mese mo nso.
Ahyɛdeɛ foforɔ na mema mo, sɛ monnodɔ mo ho sɛdeɛ medɔɔ mo no, sɛ mo nso monnodɔ mo ho mo ho!
Sɛ mododɔ mo ho a, ɛnam yei so nnipa nyinaa bɛhunu sɛ moyɛ m’asuafoɔ.

verse.content: Simon Petro see no sɛ: Awurade, ɛhe na worekorɔ? Yesu buaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Faako a merekorɔ no, wontumi nni m’akyi seesei; na akyire yi na wobɛdi m’akyire.

verse.content: Petro see no sɛ: Awurade, ɛdeɛn nti na mentumi menni w’akyi seesei? Mede me nkwa bɛto hɔ ama wo.
Yesu buaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Wode wo nkwa bɛto hɔ ama me anaa? Mereka akyerɛ wo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ, akokɔ remmɔn na woapa me mprɛnsa.
Mommma mo akoma nntutu! Monnye Onyankopɔn nni, na me nso, monnye me nni.
Tenaberɛ pii wɔ m’Agya fie; sɛ ɛnte saa a, anka maka makyerɛ mo sɛ merekɔ makɔsiesie baabi mama mo?
Na sɛ mekɔ na mekɔsiesie baabi mema mo a, mɛba bio, na mabɛfa mo makɔ me ara me nkyɛn, na deɛ mewɔ no, mo nso moaba hɔ.
Na faako a merekorɔ no, monim kwan no.

verse.content: Toma see no sɛ: Awurade, yɛnnim faako a worekorɔ, na ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yɛbɛtumi ahunu kwan no?
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Mene kwan no, nokorɛ no ne nkwa no; obi mma Agya no nkyɛn, gye sɛ ɔnam me so.
Sɛ monim me a, anka moahunu m’Agya no nso; na ɛfiri nnɛ monim no, na moahu no.

verse.content: Filipo see no sɛ: Awurade, kyerɛ yɛn Agya no, na ɛno ara dɔɔso ma yɛn.
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Me ne mo wɔ hɔ dadadada yi, monhunuu me anaa, Filipo? Deɛ wahu me no ahunu Agya no, na adɛn nti na wose: Kyerɛ yɛn Agya no?
Wonnye nni sɛ mewɔ Agya no mu, na Agya no nso wɔ me mu? Nsɛm a meka mekyerɛ mo no, ɛmfiri me ara me tirim na meka, na Agya a ɔte me mu no, na ɔyɛ ne nnwuma no.
Monnye me nni sɛ mewɔ Agya no mu, na Agya no nso wɔ me mu; na sɛ ɛnte saa a, nnwuma no ara nti monnye nni!
Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ: Deɛ ɔgye me die no, nnwuma a meyɛ no, ɔno nso bɛyɛ, na ɔbɛyɛ akɛseɛ asene yeinom, ɛfiri sɛ me deɛ, merekɔ Agya no nkyɛn.
Na biribiara a mobɛsrɛ no me din mu no, ɛno na mɛyɛ, na Agya no anya animuonyam, Ɔba no mu.
Sɛ mobɛsrɛ biribi me din mu a, me deɛ, mɛyɛ.
Sɛ modɔ me a, monni m’ahyɛdeɛ so!
Na me deɛ, mɛbisa Agya no, na wama mo Okyigyinafoɔ foforɔ, na ɔne mo abɛtena daa,
nokorɛ Honhom a wiase ntumi nnye no no, ɛfiri sɛ ɛnhu no, nanso ɛnnim no; na mo deɛ, monim no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔte mo nkyɛn, na ɔbɛtena mo mu.
Merennya mo nnyanka, mɛba mo nkyɛn.
Aka kakra na wiase nhu me bio; na mo deɛ, mohu me, ɛfiri sɛ mete ase, na mo nso mobɛtena ase.
Da no ara mobɛhunu sɛ mewɔ m’Agya no mu, na mowɔ me mu, na mewɔ mo mu.
Deɛ ɔwɔ m’ahyɛdeɛ na ɔdi soɔ no, ɔno ne deɛ ɔdɔ me; na deɛ ɔdɔ me no, m’Agya bɛdɔ no, na me nso mɛdɔ no, na mayi me ho makyerɛ no.

verse.content: Yuda (ɛnyɛ Iskariot no) see no sɛ: Awurade, ɛyɛɛ dɛn na worebɛyi wo ho akyerɛ yɛn, na ɛnyɛ wiase?
Yesu bua see no sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ obi dɔ me a, ɔbɛdi m’asɛm so, na m’Agya bɛdɔ no, na yɛbɛba ne nkyɛn, na yɛabɛyɛ yɛn tenabea ne nkyɛn.
Deɛ ɔnnɔ me no nni me nsɛm so; na asɛm a moteɛ no nyɛ me dea, na ɛyɛ Agya a ɔsomaa me no dea.
Mewɔ mo nkyɛn yi, na mereka mo yeinom;
na Okyigyinafoɔ a ɔno ne Honhom Kronkron a m’Agya bɛsoma no me din mu no, ɔno na ɔbɛkyerɛkyerɛ mo nnoɔma nyinaa, na ɔbɛkae mo deɛ maka akyerɛ mo no nyinaa.
Asomdwoeɛ na mede megya mo, m’asomdwoeɛ na mede mema mo; ɛnyɛ sɛdeɛ wiase ma na mema mo. Mommma mo akoma nntutu, nso mommma no mmmɔ mo hu.
Moate sɛ meka mekyerɛɛ mo sɛ: Merekɔ na maba mo nkyɛn. Sɛ modɔ me a, anka mo ani bɛgye sɛ merekɔ Agya no nkyɛn, ɛfiri sɛ m’Agya no yɛ kɛseɛ sene me.
Afei maka makyerɛ mo ansa na aba, na sɛ ɛnya ba a, moagye adi.
Me ne mo renkasa pii bio; na wiase sodifoɔ no reba, na ɔnni tumi biara wɔ me so.
Nanso meyɛ sɛdeɛ Agya no hyɛɛ me no, na wiase ahunu sɛ medɔ Agya no. Monsɔre mma yɛmfiri ha nkɔ!
Mene nokorɛ bobe no, na m’Agya ne okuafoɔ no.
Me ho ban biara a ɛnso aba no, ɔyi; na ebiara a ɛso aba no, ɔyiyi ho, na aso aba bebree.
Asɛm a maka makyerɛ mo no nti, mo ho anya afi.
Montena me mu, na me nso mentena mo mu: Sɛdeɛ ban ntumi mfiri ɔno ara mu nso aba gye sɛ ɛtena bobe no mu no, saa ara nso na montumi, gye sɛ motena me mu.
Mene bobe no, mone mman no. Deɛ ɔtena me mu na me nso metena ne mu no, ɔno ara na ɔso aba pii; na mokwati me a, montumi nyɛ hwee.
Sɛ obi antena me mu a, wɔto no twene sɛ ban, na ɛwu; na wɔboaboa ano de kɔgu gya mu, na ɛhye.
Sɛ motena me mu, na me nsɛm tena mo mu a, mobɛsrɛ biribiara a mopɛ, na ɛbɛyɛ hɔ ama mo.
Yei mu na wɔahyɛ m’Agya animuonyam, sɛ moso aba pii; ɛno na mobɛyɛ m’asuafoɔ.
Sɛdeɛ Agya no adɔ me no, na me nso madɔ mo; montena me dɔ mu!
Sɛ modi m’ahyɛdeɛ so a, mobɛtena me dɔ mu, sɛdeɛ madi m’Agya ahyɛdeɛ soɔ na mete ne dɔ mu no.
Maka yeinom nyinaa makyerɛ mo, na m’anigyeɛ atena mo mu, na mo anigyeɛ awie pɛyɛ.
Yei ne m’ahyɛdeɛ, sɛ monnodɔ mo ho sɛdeɛ medɔɔ mo no.
Obi nni dɔ kɛseɛ a ɛsene yei, sɛ obi de ne nkwa bɛto hɔ ama ne nnamfo.
Sɛ moyɛ deɛ mehyɛ mo a, na moyɛ me nnamfo.
Memfrɛ mo nkoa bio, ɛfiri sɛ akoa nnim deɛ ne wura reyɛ; na mafrɛ mo nnamfo, ɛfiri sɛ nnoɔma a mate no m’Agya nkyɛn nyinaa maka makyerɛ mo.
Ɛnyɛ mo na moayi me, na me na mayi mo, na mede mo masi hɔ sɛ monkɔ, na monkɔso aba, na mo aba no ntena hɔ, na biribiara a mobɛsrɛ Agya no me din mu no, ɔde ama mo.
Yei na mehyɛ mo, sɛ monnodɔ mo ho.
Sɛ wiase tane mo a, monhunu sɛ watane me kane ansa na ɛretane mo.
Sɛ mofiri wiase a, anka wiase bɛdɔ ɔno ara ne deɛ; na sɛ momfiri wiase na mayi mo afiri wiase yi, yei nti na wiase tane mo.
Monkae asɛm a meka mekyerɛɛ mo sɛ: Akoa nsene ne wura. Sɛ wɔataa me a, wɔbɛtaa mo nso; sɛ wɔadi m’asɛm so a, wɔbɛdi mo deɛ so bi.
Na yeinom nyinaa, me din nti na wɔde bɛyɛ mo, ɛfiri sɛ wɔnnim deɛ ɔsomaa me no.
Sɛ mamma mammɛka mankyerɛ wɔn a, anka wɔnni bɔne; na afei deɛ, wɔnni wɔn bɔne ho anoyie.
Deɛ ɔtane me no tane m’Agya no nso.
Sɛ manyɛ nnwuma a obiara nyɛɛ da wɔ wɔn mu a, anka wɔnni bɔne; na afei deɛ, wɔahunu, nanso wɔatane me ne m’Agya.
Na ɛyɛɛ hɔ, na asɛm a wɔatwerɛ no wɔn mmara mu no aba mu sɛ: Wɔtane me kwa.
Na Okyigyinafoɔ a mɛsoma no mabrɛ mo afiri Agya no nkyɛn, nokorɛ Honhom a ɔfiri Agya no nkyɛn reba no, sɛ ɔnya ba a, ɔno na ɔbɛdi me ho adanseɛ;
na mo nso mobɛdi adanseɛ, ɛfiri sɛ moka me ho firi mfitiaseɛ.
Yeinom na maka makyerɛ mo na moansunti.
Wɔbɛtu mo afiri hyia adan mu; mpo ɛberɛ reba a obiara a ɔbɛkum mo bɛsusu sɛ ɔde resom Onyankopɔn.
Na wɔbɛyɛ yeinom, ɛfiri sɛ wɔnnya nhunuu Agya no ne me.
Na maka yeinom makyerɛ mo, na sɛ ɛberɛ no duru a, moakae sɛ maka makyerɛ mo.
Na manka mo yeinom mamfiri mfitiaseɛ, ɛfiri sɛ me ne mo na na ɛwɔ hɔ.
Na afei deɛ, merekɔ deɛ ɔsomaa me no nkyɛn, na mo mu biara mmisa me sɛ: Ɛhe na worekorɔ?
Na sɛ maka yeinom makyerɛ mo nti, awerɛhoɔ ahyɛ mo akoma ma.
Na meka mo nokorɛ; ɛyɛ ma mo sɛ mekorɔ. Na sɛ mankɔ a, Okyigyinafoɔ no remma mo nkyɛn, na sɛ mekɔ a, mɛsoma no aba mo nkyɛn.
Na ɔno deɛ, sɛ ɔba a, ɔbɛyi wiase atɛn bɔne ne tenenee ne atemmuo ho.
Bɔne ho, ɛfiri sɛ wɔnnye me nni;
ne tenenee ho, ɛfiri sɛ merekɔ Agya no nkyɛn, na monhu me bio;
ne atemmuo ho, ɛfiri sɛ wɔabu wiase sodifoɔ no atɛn.
Mewɔ nsɛm pii meka mekyerɛ mo, nanso montumi nsoa seesei.
Na sɛ ɔno, nokorɛ Honhom no, nya ba a, ɔbɛkyerɛ mo kwan akɔ nokorɛ no nyinaa mu. Na ɛmfiri ɔno ara ne mu na ɔbɛkasa, na biribiara a ɔbɛteɛ no, ɔbɛka, na ɔbɛkyerɛ mo nnoɔma a ɛreba.
Ɔno na ɔbɛhyɛ me animuonyam; ɛfiri sɛ, ɔbɛfa me deɛ bi na ɔde abɛkyerɛ mo.
Nnoɔma a m’Agya wɔ nyinaa yɛ me dea; yei nti na mekaa sɛ: Ɔbɛfa me deɛ bi na ɔde abɛkyerɛ mo.
Aka kakraa bi na monhu me; na bio aka kakraa bi mobɛhu me.

verse.content: Ɛnna n’asuafoɔ no mu binom kekaa no wɔn mu sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na ɔse yɛn yi sɛ:

wj.content: Aka kakraa bi na monhu me, na bio aka kakraa bi mobɛhu me, ne sɛ: Merekɔ Agya no nkyɛn yi?

verse.content: Ɛnna asuafoɔ no se: Ɛdeɛn ne deɛ ɔka yi sɛ:

wj.content: Aka kakraa bi?

verse.content: Yɛnte deɛ ɔreka yi ase.
Ɛnna Yesu hunuu sɛ wɔrepɛ abisa no, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Yei ho na mobisabisa wɔ mo mu sɛ mekaa sɛ: Aka kakraa bi na monhu me, na bio aka kakraa bi mobɛhu me.
Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ: Mobɛsu na moatwa adwo, na wiasefoɔ ani bɛgye; na mo deɛ, mo werɛ bɛho, nanso mo awerɛhoɔ no bɛdane anigyeɛ.
Ɔbaa, sɛ ɔrewo a, ɔte yea, ɛfiri sɛ ne dɔn adu; na sɛ ɔnya wo ɔba no a, ɔnkae ahohia no bio, anigyeɛ a wanya sɛ wɔawo ɔba aba wiase no nti.
Na mo nso, seesei deɛ, mowɔ awerɛhoɔ; na mɛhu mo bio, na mo akoma bɛtɔ mo yam, na mo anigyeɛ no, obi rennye mo nsam;
na da no moremmisa me biribiara. Mereka akyerɛ mo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ: Biribiara a mobɛsrɛ Agya no me din mu no, ɔde bɛma mo.
Ɛde bɛduru sɛsɛɛ deɛ, monsrɛɛ biribi me din mu; monsrɛ, na mobɛnya, na mo anigyeɛ awie pɛyɛ.
Yeinom na maka mo mmebuo mu; na berɛ no reba a merenkasa menkyerɛ mo mmebuo mu bio, na mɛka Agya no ho asɛm makyerɛ mo pefee.
Da no na mobɛsrɛ wɔ me din mu, na menka menkyerɛ mo sɛ mɛbisa Agya no mama mo,
na Agya no ara dɔ mo, ɛfiri sɛ modɔ me, na moagye adi sɛ mefiri Agya no nkyɛn na mebaeɛ.
Mefiri Agya no nkyɛn na mebaa wiase; na bio, merefiri wiase na makɔ Agya no nkyɛn.

verse.content: N’asuafoɔ no see no sɛ: Hwɛ, afei deɛ, wokasa pefee, na wommu bɛ biara.
Afei yɛahunu sɛ wonim nnoɔma nyinaa, na ɛnhia wo sɛ obi bisa woɔ; yei mu na yɛgye di sɛ wofiri Nyankopɔn nkyɛn na ɛbaeɛ.
Yesu bisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Afei deɛ, mogye di anaa?
Hwɛ, dɔn no reba, na anya adu sɛ mo nyinaa bɛhwete akɔ mo nkuro mu, na moagya me nko; nanso ɛnkaa me nko, ɛfiri sɛ Agya no ka me ho.
Yeinom na maka mo, na moanya me mu asomdwoeɛ. Mo ho bɛhiahia mo wiase deɛ, nanso momma mo bo ntɔ mo yam! Madi wiase so nkonim.

verse.content: Yeinom na Yesu kaeɛ, na ɔmaa n’ani so kyerɛɛ soro, na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Agya, dɔn no adu. Hyɛ wo Ba animuonyam, na Ɔba no nso ahyɛ wo animuonyam,
sɛdeɛ womaa no honam nyinaa so tumi, sɛ adeɛ biara a wɔde ama no no, ɔmma wɔn daa nkwa.
Na yei ne daa nkwa, sɛ wɔbɛhu wo, nokorɛ Nyankopɔn koro no, ne deɛ wosomaa no no, Yesu Kristo no.
Me deɛ, mahyɛ wo animuonyam asase so; mawie adwuma a wode maa me sɛ menyɛ no.
Na afei, Agya, fa animuonyam a mewɔ no wo nkyɛn ansa na wɔbɔɔ wiase no hyɛ me wo ara wo nkyɛn!
Mayi wo din adi makyerɛ nnipa a wode wɔn firi wiase ama me no. Wɔyɛ wo dea, na wode wɔn ama me; na wɔadi w’asɛm so.
Afei wɔahunu sɛ nnoɔma a wode ama me no nyinaa firi wo nkyɛn;
ɛfiri sɛ nsɛm a wode ama me no, mede mama wɔn; na wɔn nso wɔagye, na wɔahunu ampa sɛ, mefiri wo nkyɛn na mebaeɛ, na wɔagye adi sɛ wo na wosomaa me.
Me deɛ, meresrɛ mama wɔn; mensrɛ memma wiase, na mmom wɔn a wode wɔn ama me no, ɛfiri sɛ wɔyɛ wo dea.
Na m’adeɛ nyinaa yɛ wo dea; na wo deɛ nso yɛ me dea; na manya animuonyam wɔn mu.
Na afei menni wiase bio, — na yeinom na ɛwɔ wiase, na me deɛ, mereba wo nkyɛn. Agya Kronkron, wɔn a wode wɔn ama me no, fa wɔn sie wo din mu, na wɔayɛ baako sɛ yɛn.
Mewɔ wɔn nkyɛn no, mede wɔn mesiee wo din mu, wɔn a wode wɔn ama me no; mawɛn wɔn, na wɔn mu bi nyerae, gye ɔyera ba no, — na twerɛsɛm no aba mu.
Na afei na mereba wo nkyɛn, na meka yeinom wiase, na wɔanya m’anigyeɛ ama awie pɛyɛ wɔ wɔn mu.
Mede w’asɛm mama wɔn; na wiase atane wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ wɔmfiri wiase, sɛdeɛ me nso memfiri wiase no.
Mensrɛ sɛ: Yi wɔn firi wiase, na mmom sɛ: Bɔ wɔn ho ban firi ɔbɔnefoɔ no ho.
Wɔmfiri wiase, sɛdeɛ me nso memfiri wiase no.
Yɛ wɔn kronkron wɔ nokorɛ mu; w’asɛm yɛ nokorɛ.
Sɛdeɛ wosomaa me wiase no, saa ara na me nso meresoma wɔn wiase.
Na meyɛ me ho kronkron mema wɔn, na wɔn nso ayɛ kronkron nokorɛ mu.
Na ɛnyɛ yeinom nkutoo nti na mesrɛ, na mmom wɔn a wɔnam wɔn asɛm so bɛgye me adie nso nti,
sɛ wɔn nyinaa nyɛ baako, sɛdeɛ wo, Agya, wowɔ me mu, na mewɔ wo mu; sɛ wɔn nso nyɛ baako wɔ yɛn mu, na wiase nnye nni sɛ wo na wosomaa me.
Na mede animuonyam a wode ama me no mama wɔn, sɛ wɔnyɛ baako, sɛdeɛ yɛyɛ baako no.
Mewɔ wɔn mu, na wowɔ me mu, na wɔawie pɛyɛ baakoyɛ mu, na wiase ahunu sɛ, wo na wosomaa me, na wodɔ wɔn sɛdeɛ wodɔ me no.
Agya, wɔn a wɔde wɔn ama me no, mepɛ sɛ faako a mewɔ no, wɔn nso mmɛka me ho, na wɔnhunu m’animuonyam a womaa me no, ɛfiri sɛ wodɔ me ansa na wɔhyɛɛ wiase ase.
Agya Tenenee, wiase anhu wo, na me deɛ, mahu wo, na yeinom ahunu sɛ wo na wosomaa me;
na mayi wo din makyerɛ wɔn, na mɛyi makyerɛ. Na ɔdɔ a wode dɔ me no atena wɔn mu, na matena wɔn mu.

verse.content: Yesu kaa yeinom no, ɔne n’asuafoɔ no firii adi kɔtwaa Asuo Kidron faako a turo bi wɔ, na ɔne n’asuafoɔ no kɔɔ mu.
Na Yuda nso a ɔyii no maeɛ no nim hɔ, ɛfiri sɛ na Yesu ne n’asuafoɔ no taa kɔhyia hɔ.
Ɛnna Yuda de asraafokuo ne asomfoɔ a wɔfiri asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne Farisifoɔ no nkyɛn baa hɔ; wɔkurakura ntɛnee, nkanea ne akodeɛ.
Ɛnna Yesu a ɔnim deɛ ɛreba ne so nyinaa no firii adie, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Morehwehwɛ hwan?

verse.content: Wɔbuaa no sɛ: Yesu, Nasareni no. Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Meni!

verse.content: Nso Yuda a ɔyii no maeɛ no nso ne wɔn na ɛgyina hɔ.
Ɛnna ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Meni!

verse.content: no, wɔpimpinii akyire, na wɔhwehwee ase.
Ɛnna ɔbisaa wɔn bio sɛ:

wj.content: Morehwehwɛ hwan?

verse.content: Na wɔse: Yesu, Nasareni no.
Yesu buaa sɛ:

wj.content: Maka makyerɛ mo sɛ meni; enti sɛ me na morehwehwɛ me a, momma yeinom nkɔ!

verse.content: Sɛ asɛm a ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Wɔn a wode wɔn ama me no, mamma wɔn mu biara anyera,

verse.content: no mmra mu.
Ɛnna Simon Petro a ɔkura nkrantɛ no tweeɛ, na ɔde bɔɔ ɔsɔfo panin no akoa, na ɔtwaa n’aso nifa; na akoa no din de Malko.
Ɛnna Yesu see Petro sɛ:

wj.content: Fa nkrantɛ no hyɛ bɔha mu! Kuruwa a m’Agya de ama me no, mennnom anaa?

verse.content: Ɛnna asraafokuo no ne wɔn safohene ne Yudafoɔ asomfoɔ no sɔɔ Yesu mu, na wɔkyekyeree no,
na wɔde no kɔɔ Hana nkyɛn kane; na Kaiafa a ɔdi afe no mu sɔfo panin ase ne no.
Nso Kaiafa no ne deɛ ɔtuu Yudafoɔ no fo sɛ: Ɛyɛ sɛ onipa baako bɛwu ama ɔman no.
Na Simon Petro ne osuani baako bi dii Yesu akyi; nso ɔsɔfo panin no nim osuani no, na ɔne Yesu hyɛnee ɔsɔfo panin no aban mu hɔ.
Na Petro deɛ, ɔgyinaa mfikyire pono no ano. Ɛnna osuani baako a ɔsɔfo panin no nim no no firii adi bɛka kyerɛɛ ɔbaa a ɔhwɛ pono no ano no, na ɔde Petro baa mu.
Ɛnna abaawa a ɔhwɛ pono no ano no see Petro sɛ: Wo nso womfiri onipa yi asuafoɔ mu bi anaa? Petro buaa sɛ: Dabi.
Nso na nkoa ne asomfoɔ no gyinagyina hɔ asɔ gya, ɛfiri sɛ awɔ aba, na wɔretoɔ; na Petro nso ne wɔn gyina hɔ na ɔreto bie.
Ɛnna ɔsɔfo panin no bisaa Yesu n’asuafoɔ ne ne nkyerɛkyerɛ ho asɛm.
Yesu buaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Me deɛ, mekasaa pefee mekyerɛɛ wiase; daa mekyerɛkyerɛɛ hyia adan mu ne asɔrefie, faako a Yudafoɔ nyinaa hyia, na kokoam deɛ menkaa hwee.
Adɛn na wobisa me? Bisa wɔn a wɔteeɛ no, ne deɛ mesee wɔn; hwɛ, wɔn na wɔnim deɛ mekaeɛ.

verse.content: Na ɔkaa saa no, asomfoɔ no mu baako a ɔgyina hɔ no bɔɔ Yesu sotorɔ kaa sɛ: Sɛdeɛ wobua ɔsɔfo panin nie?
Yesu buaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ maka no bɔne a, di bɔne no ho adanseɛ; na sɛ ɛyɛ a, adɛn nti na wobɔɔ me?

verse.content: Hana maa wɔde homa kyekyeree no kɔmaa Ɔsɔfopanin Kaiafa.
Na Simon Petro gyina hɔ reto gya. Ɛnna wɔsee no sɛ: Wo nso, womfiri n’asuafoɔ no mu anaa? Ɔsanee sɛ: Dabi!
Ɔsɔfo panin no nkoa no mu baako a ɔyɛ deɛ Petro twaa n’aso no busuani kaa sɛ: Manhu wo ne no turom hɔ?
Ɛnna Petro sanee bio, na ntɛm ara akokɔ bɔnee.
Ɛnna wɔde Yesu firi Kaiafa nkyɛn kɔɔ amrado aban mu; na ɛyɛ anɔpatutu. Na wɔn ara deɛ, wɔanhyɛne amrado aban no mu, na efi anka wɔn, na wɔadi Twam (aduane) no.
Ɛnna Pilato firii adi baa wɔn nkyɛn, na ɔbisaa sɛ: Kwaadu bɛn na mobɔ tia saa onipa yi?
Wɔbua see no sɛ: Sɛ oyi nyɛ ɔdebɔneyɛni a, anka yɛamfa no ammrɛ wo.
Ɛnna Pilato see wɔn sɛ: Mo ara momfa no, na monkɔbu no atɛn sɛdeɛ mo mmara teɛ. Ɛnna Yudafoɔ no see no sɛ: Yɛn deɛ, yɛnni ho kwan sɛ yɛkum obiara.
(Ɛbaa saa no, na Yesu asɛm a ɔka de kyerɛɛ owu korɔ a ɔrebɛwuo no aba mu.)
Ɛnna Pilato hyɛnee amrado aban no mu bio, na ɔfrɛɛ Yesu bisaa no sɛ: Wone Yudafoɔ hene no anaa?
Yesu buaa no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɛfiri wo ara wo tirim na woka yei, anaasɛ nnipa bi na ɛkaa me ho asɛm kyerɛɛ woɔ?

verse.content: Pilato buaa no sɛ: Meyɛ Yudani anaa? Wo ara wo manfoɔ ne asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ no na wɔde wo brɛɛ me; ɛdeɛn na woyɛeɛ?
Yesu buaa sɛ:

wj.content: M’ahennie mfiri wiase. Sɛ m’ahennie firi wiase a, anka m’asomfoɔ bɛko na wɔamfa me anhyɛ Yudafoɔ no nsa; nanso m’ahennie mfiri ha.

verse.content: Ɛnna Pilato see no sɛ: Na woyɛ ɔhene ne no? Yesu buaa sɛ:

wj.content: Wo na woreka sɛ meyɛ ɔhene. Me deɛ, yei nti na wɔwoo me, na mebaa wiase, sɛ merebɛdi nokorɛ no ho adanseɛ; obiara a ɔfiri nokorɛ no mu no tie me nne.

verse.content: Pilato see no sɛ: Ɛdeɛn ne nokorɛ?
Na ɔkaa yei no, ɔfirii adi kɔɔ Yudafoɔ no nkyɛn bio na ɔsee wɔn sɛ: Me deɛ, menhunu ne mu afobusɛm biara.
Nso mowɔ amanneɛ sɛ megyaa ɔbaako mema mo Twam da mu; enti mopɛ sɛ megyaa Yudafoɔ hene no mema mo anaa?
Ɛnna wɔn nyinaa teaa mu bio sɛ: Ɛnyɛ oyi, na mmom Baraba! Nso Baraba yɛ odwotwafoɔ.
Ɛnna afei Pilato faa Yesu, na ɔkaa no mpire.
Na asraafoɔ no nwonoo nkasɛɛ abotire, na wɔde hyɛɛ ne ti, na wɔde ntoma kɔkɔɔ bi guguu ne so,
na wɔkɔɔ so ara baa ne nkyɛn kaa sɛ: Yudafoɔ hene, mo oo! Na wɔbobɔɔ no asotorɔ.
Ɛnna Pilato firii adi baa bio, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ: Hwɛ, mede no rebrɛ mo, na moahunu sɛ menhunu ne mu afobusɛm biara.
Ɛnna Yesu firii adi baeɛ, na ɔbɔ nkasɛɛ abotire, hyɛ atadeɛ kɔkɔɔ no. Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ: Hwɛ, onipa no nie!
Ɛnna asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ ne asomfoɔ no hunuu no no, wɔteateaa mu sɛ: Bɔ no asɛnnua mu! Bɔ no asɛnnua mu! Pilato see wɔn sɛ: Mo ara momfa no nkɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu! Na me deɛ, menhunu ne mu afobusɛm biara.
Yudafoɔ no buaa no sɛ: Yɛn deɛ, yɛwɔ mmara, na yɛn mmara no nti ɛtwa sɛ ɔwuo, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛɛ ne ho Nyankopɔn ba.
Ɛnna Pilato tee asɛm yi no, ɔsuroo pii,
na ɔhyɛnee amrado aban no mu bio, na ɔbisaa Yesu sɛ: Wofiri he? Na Yesu ammua no.
Ɛnna Pilato see no sɛ: Wo ne me nkasa? Wonnim sɛ mewɔ tumi sɛ megyaa woɔ, na mewɔ tumi sɛ mebɔ wo asɛnnua mu anaa?
Yesu buaa sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ wɔamfa amma wo amfiri soro a, anka wonni me so tumi biara; yei nti deɛ ɔyii me maa woɔ no na ne bɔne so.

verse.content: Ɛfiri hɔ no, Pilato hwehwɛɛ sɛ ɔgyaa no; na Yudafoɔ no teaa mu sɛ: Sɛ wogyaa oyi a, wonyɛ Kaesare adamfo; obiara a ɔyɛ ne ho hene no tia Kaesare.
Na Pilato tee saa asɛm no, ɔde Yesu firii adi, na ɔbɛtenaa atemmuo adwa so baabi a wɔfrɛ hɔ sɛ Abo-sɛeɛ, na Hebri mu wɔfrɛ no Gabata.
Na ɛyɛ Twam ho nsiesie da, na ɛbɛyɛ awia dummienu. Na ɔsee Yudafoɔ no sɛ: Hwɛ, mo hene nie!
Na wɔteaa mu sɛ: Fa no kɔ! Fa no kɔ! Bɔ no asɛnnua mu! Pilato see wɔn sɛ: Memmɔ mo hene asɛnnua mu anaa? Asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ no buaa sɛ: Yɛnni ɔhene bi sɛ Kaesare.
Ɛno na afei ɔyii no maa wɔn hyɛɛ sɛ wɔnkɔbɔ no asɛnnua mu.
Na wɔfaa Yesu de no kɔeɛ.
Na ɔso n’asɛnnua firii adi kɔduruu baabi a wɔfrɛ hɔ Tikwankoraabea a Hebri mu wɔfrɛ no Golgota.
Ɛhɔ na wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu, a nnipa baanu ka ne ho n’afanu, na Yesu wɔ wɔn ntam.
Na Pilato twerɛɛ ɛho asɛm nso, na ɔde famm asɛnnua no atifi, na ɛka sɛ: Yesu, Nasareni, Yudafoɔ hene.
Saa atwerɛ yi na Yudafoɔ no mu pii kenkaneeɛ, ɛfiri sɛ, faako a wɔbɔɔ Yesu asɛnnua mu hɔ bɛn kuro no; na wɔatwerɛ no Hebri ne Roma ne Hela kasa mu.
Na Yudafoɔ asɔfoɔ mpanimfoɔ no see Pilato sɛ: Ntwerɛ sɛ: Yudafoɔ hene, na twerɛ sɛ: Ɔno na ɔkaa sɛ: Mene Yudafoɔ hene.
Pilato buaa sɛ: Deɛ matwerɛ no, matwerɛ.
Na asraafoɔ no bɔɔ Yesu asɛnnua mu no, wɔfaa ne ntoma, na wɔkyɛɛ mu nnan maa ɔsraani baako nyaa baako, ne n’atadeɛ. Nso atadeɛ nhyɛaseɛ no nni mpameeɛ, wɔnwono firi soro bɛsii fam.
Ɛnna wɔsesee wɔn ho sɛ: Mommma yɛnnsusuane mu, na momma yɛntwe so ntonto nhunu deɛ ɛbɛyɛ ne dea. Na twerɛsɛm a ɛse:

block_quote.content: na m’atadeɛ so na wɔtwee ntonto, no baa mu.

verse.content: Enti asraafoɔ no na ɛyɛɛ yeinom.
Nso na Yesu ne na ne ne na nuabaa, Maria, Klopa yere ne Maria Magdalene gyina Yesu asɛnnua no ho.
Na Yesu hunuu ne na ne osuani a ɔdɔ no no sɛ ɔgyina hɔ no, ɔsee ne na sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔbaa, hwɛ, wo ba ni!

verse.content: Afei ɔsee osuani no sɛ:

wj.content: Hwɛ, wo na nie!

verse.content: Na ɛfiri dɔn no ara mu no, osuani no de no kɔɔ ɔno ara ne fie.
