Yei akyiri a Yesu hunuu sɛ wɔanya awie nnoɔma nyinaa no, (sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na twerɛsɛm no aba mu nti), ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Osukɔm de me.

verse.content: Nso na nsa kekakeka adeɛ bi ma si hɔ, na wɔde nsa no bi hyɛɛ sapɔ ma, na wɔde tuaa sommɛ ano de kaa n’ano.
Ɛnna Yesu gyee nsa kekakeka no, ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Mawie!

verse.content: Na ɔbɔɔ ne tiri ase na ɔgyae ne honhom mu.
Nso na da no yɛ Ahosiesie da, na sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na amu no renka asɛnnua no so homeda, ɛfiri sɛ, na saa homeda no yɛ da kɛseɛ nti, Yudafoɔ no bɛsrɛɛ Pilato sɛ wɔnkɔbubu wɔn nnyawa na wɔnyi wɔn.
Ɛnna asraafoɔ no ba bɛbubuu deɛ ɔdi kan no nnyawa ne deɛ ɔka ho a wɔbɔɔ wɔn ne Yesu asɛnnua mu no deɛ.
Na wɔduruu Yesu soɔ na wɔhunuu sɛ wawu dada no, wɔammubu ne nnyawa.
Na asraafoɔ no mu baako de pea wɔɔ ne mfe mu, na ntɛm ara na mogya ne nsuo firii mu baeɛ.
Na deɛ ɔhunuiɛ no adi adanseɛ, — na n’adanseɛ no yɛ nokorɛ, na ɔno deɛ, ɔnim sɛ ɔka nokorɛ, — na mo nso moagye adi.
Na wɔyɛɛ yeinom na twerɛsɛm a ɛse: Wɔmmmu ne dompe bi, no aba mu.
Na bio twerɛsɛm foforɔ se: Wɔbɛhwɛ deɛ wɔwɔɔ no (pea) no.
Na yeinom akyiri no, Yosef a ɔfiri Arimatea a ɔyɛ Yesu suani, na Yudafoɔ ho hu nti, ɔyɛɛ no kokoam no, bɛsrɛɛ Pilato sɛ ɔmma no nyi Yesu amu no; na Pilato maa no ɛho kwan. Na ɔba bɛyii n’amu no.
Na Nikodemo nso a da bi ɔbaa Yesu nkyɛn anadwoɔ no bae, na ɔde korɔbɔ ne pɛprɛ mfrafraeɛ bɛyɛ nkariboɔ ɔha bae.
Ɛnna wɔfaa Yesu amu no, na wɔde nwera ne nnuro kyekyeree ne ho, sɛdeɛ Yudafoɔ amusie teɛ no.
Nso faako a wɔbɔɔ no asɛnnua mu hɔ no, turo bi wɔ hɔ, na turo no mu na ɔboda foforɔ bi a wɔmfaa onipa ntoo mu da wɔ;
na ɛhɔ na Yudafoɔ Ahosiesie da no nti, wɔde Yesu kɔtoeɛ, ɛfiri sɛ ɔboda no na ɛbɛn.

note.content: Hela kasa no ka no sɛ:

verse.content: Na da a ɛdi nnawɔtwe kan anɔpatutuutu a esum da so wɔ mu no, Maria Magdalene baa ɔboda no ho, na ɔbɛhunuu sɛ wɔayi ɔboɔ no afiri ɛda no ano.
Ɛnna ɔtuu mmirika baa Simon Petro ne osuani baako a Yesu dɔ no no nkyɛn, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ: Wɔayi Awurade afiri ɛda no mu, na yɛnnim faako a wɔde no akɔtoɔ.
Ɛnna Petro ne osuani baako no firii adi baa ɛda no ho.
Na wɔn baanu nyinaa tutuu mmirika, na osuani baako no yɛɛ ntɛm siane Petro ho, na ɔkɔduruu ɛda no ho kane.
Na ɔbrɛɛ ne mu ase hwɛɛ mu no, n’ani bɔɔ nwera no so sɛ ɛgu hɔ deɛ, nanso wankɔ mu.
Ɛnna Simon Petro dii n’akyiri baeɛ, na ɔkɔɔ ɛda no mu, na ɔhwɛɛ nwera a ɛgu hɔ no
ne duku a wɔde bɔɔ ne tire nanso sɛ ɛngu nwera no ho, na mmom wɔabobɔ ɛno nkutoo da baabi no.
Ɛno na afei osuani baako a ɔduruu ɛda no ho kane no nso hyɛnee mu, na ɔhunui, na ɔgye dii.
Na na wɔnnya nhunuu twerɛsɛm no, sɛ ɛtwa sɛ ɔsɔre firi awufoɔ mu no.
Ɛnna asuafoɔ no sane baa wɔn fie bio.
Na Maria deɛ, na ɔgyina ɔboda no ho resu. Ɛnna ɔresu no, ɔbɔɔ ne mu ase hwɛɛ ɛda no mu,
na ɔhunuu abɔfoɔ a wɔhyɛ ntadeɛ fitaa sɛ wɔtete hɔ, ɔbaako te atifi, na ɔbaako te anafoɔ, faako a Yesu amu daeɛ hɔ.
Na wɔbisaa no sɛ: Ɔbaa, adɛn na woresu? Ɔsee wɔn sɛ: Ɛfiri sɛ wɔafa me wura kɔ, na mennim faako a wɔde no akɔtoɔ.
Na ɔkaa saa no, ɔdanee ne ho hwɛɛ n’akyi, na ɔhunuu Yesu sɛ ɔgyina hɔ, na na ɔnnim sɛ ɛyɛ Yesu.
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Ɔbaa, adɛn na woresu? Worehwehwɛ hwan?

verse.content: Na ɔno deɛ, ɔsusuu sɛ ɛyɛ turom hɔ hwɛfoɔ nti, ɔsee no sɛ: Owura, sɛ woafa no afiri ha a, kyerɛ me faako a wode no akɔtoɔ, na menkɔfa no!
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Maria!

verse.content: Na ɔdanee ne ho see no Hebri kasa mu sɛ: Raboni! (aseɛ ne sɛ: Ɔkyerɛkyerɛfoɔ).
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Mfa wo nsa nka me, na mennya menkɔɔ ɔsoro, m’Agya nkyɛn. Na kɔ me nuanom nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛ wɔn sɛ merebɛkɔ ɔsoro, m’Agya ne mo Agya ne me Nyankopɔn ne mo Nyankopɔn nkyɛn.

verse.content: Na Maria Magdalene ba bɛka kyerɛɛ asuafoɔ no sɛ: Mahunu Awurade; ne nsɛm a ɔka kyerɛɛ no no nyinaa.
Ɛnna da a ɛdi nnawɔtwe kan no ara, ɛduruu anwummerɛ na Yudafoɔ ho hu nti wɔatoto apono mu faako a asuafoɔ no ahyia hɔ no, Yesu ba bɛgyinaa wɔn mfimfini, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Asomdwoeɛ nka mo!

verse.content: Na ɔkaa saa no, ɔde ne nsa ne ne mfe mu kyerɛɛ wɔn. Na asuafoɔ no hunuu Awurade no, wɔn ani gyeeɛ.
Ɛnna Yesu see wɔn bio sɛ:

wj.content: Asomdwoeɛ nka mo! Sɛdeɛ Agya no asoma me no, me nso mesoma mo.

verse.content: Na ɔkaa saa no, ɔhome guu wɔn so, na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Monnye Honhom Kronkron!
Wɔn a mode wɔn bɔne kyɛ wɔn no, wɔde akyɛ wɔn; na wɔn a momma wɔn bɔne tena hɔ no, wɔama no atena hɔ.

verse.content: Na Toma, dummienu no mu baako a wɔfrɛ no Ata no, nni wɔn mu na Yesu baeɛ.
Ɛnna asuafoɔ no see no sɛ: Yɛahunu Awurade. Na Toma ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Sɛ manhunu ne nsam nnadewa no ananmu, na mamfa me nsateaa manka nnadewa no ananmu a, merennye menni.
Na ɛno akyiri nnawɔtwe, na n’asuafoɔ no wɔ ɛdan mu bio, na Toma ka wɔn ho. Na Yesu bae, nso na apono no mu atoto, na ɔbɛgyinaa wɔn mfimfini, na ɔkaa sɛ:

wj.content: Asomdwoeɛ nka mo!

verse.content: Ɛnna afei ɔsee Toma sɛ:

wj.content: Fa wo nsateaa bra ha na bɛhwɛ me nsamu, na fa wo nsa bɛka me mfe mu, na nyɛ okyinnyegyefoɔ, na gye di!

verse.content: Toma bua see no sɛ: M’Awurade ne me Nyankopɔn!
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Toma, sɛ woahu me nti na woagye adie. Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔnhunuiɛ, na wɔgye die.

verse.content: Na afei, nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ pii nso wɔ hɔ a Yesu yɛɛ no asuafoɔ no anim a wɔantwerɛ no nwoma yi mu.
Na yeinom na wɔatwerɛ sɛ monnye nni sɛ Yesu ne Kristo no, Nyankopɔn Ba, na mogye di a, moanya nkwa ne din mu.
Yeinom akyiri no, Yesu yii ne ho kyerɛɛ n’asuafoɔ no bio Tiberia po ho. Na sɛdeɛ ɔyii ne ho kyerɛeɛ nie:
Na Simon Petro ne Toma a wɔfrɛ no Ata ne Natanael a ɔfiri Kana a ɛwɔ Galilea ne Sebedeo mma ne n’asuafoɔ no mu baanu nso wɔ hɔ.
Simon Petro see wɔn sɛ: Merekɔ po. Wɔsee no sɛ: Yɛn nso, yɛne wo bɛkɔ. Wɔfirii adi kɔɔ kodoɔ mu, na anadwo no, wɔannyi hwee.
Na adeɛ reyɛ akye no, Yesu bɛgyinaa mpoano, nanso na asuafoɔ no nnim sɛ ɛyɛ Yesu.
Ɛnna Yesu bisaa wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Yaanom, moanya nam anaa?

verse.content: Wɔbuaa no sɛ: Dabi.
Na ɔsee wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Momfa asau no ngu kodoɔ no nifa, na mobɛnya bi.

verse.content: Ɛnna wɔguiɛ, na mpataa no dodoɔ nti, na wɔntumi ntwe asau no bio.
Ɛnna osuani a Yesu dɔ no no see Petro sɛ: Ɛyɛ Awurade a! Ɛnna Simon Petro tee sɛ ɛyɛ Awurade no, ɔde n’atadeɛ kyekyeree ne ho soɔ, ɛfiri sɛ na ɔda adagya, na ɔtoo ne ho hwee ɛpo no mu.
Na asuafoɔ a aka no nam kodoɔ kumaa no mu bae, na wɔne asase so nware, na ɛbɛyɛ basafa ɔha, na wɔtwee asau no ne mpataa no.
Na wɔsii fam no, wɔhunuu nnyansramma a ɛnam gu soɔ ne paanoo.
Na Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Momfa nam a moyii no seesei no bi mmra!

verse.content: Simon Petro kɔe, na ɔkɔtwee asau no baa asase so; na mpataa akɛseɛ ɔha aduonum mmiɛnsa ayɛ no ma; wɔdɔɔso saa deɛ, nanso asau no antete.
Yesu see wɔn sɛ:

wj.content: Mommra mmɛka mo ano.

verse.content: Nso asuafoɔ no mu biara antumi ammisa no sɛ: Woyɛ hwan? Na wɔnim sɛ ɛyɛ Awurade.
Ɛnna Yesu bɛfaa paanoo no de maa wɔn, ɛne apataa no saa ara.
Yei ne ne mprɛnsa so a Yesu nyane firii awufoɔ mu no, ɔyii ne ho kyerɛɛ asuafoɔ no.
Ɛnna wɔdidi wieeɛ no, Yesu see Simon Petro sɛ:

wj.content: Simon, Yohane ba, wodɔ me sene yeinom?

verse.content: Ɔsee no sɛ: Aane, Awurade, wonim sɛ medɔ wo. Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Yɛne me nnwammaa!

verse.content: Yesu see no ne mprenu so sɛ:

wj.content: Simon, Yohane ba, wodɔ me?

verse.content: Ɔsee no sɛ: Aane, Awurade, wonim sɛ medɔ wo. Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Hwɛ me nnwan!

verse.content: Ɔsee no ne mprɛnsa so sɛ:

wj.content: Simon, Yohane ba, wodɔ me?

verse.content: Ɛyɛɛ Petro awerɛho sɛ wabisa no mprɛnsa sɛ:

wj.content: Wodɔ me?

verse.content: Na ɔbuaa no sɛ: Awurade, wonim ade nyinaa, wonim sɛ medɔ wo. Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Yɛne me nnwan!
Mereka akyerɛ wo nokorɛ mu pa ara sɛ, woyɛ aberanteɛ no, wobɔɔ abɔsoɔ, na wokɔɔ faako a wopɛ; na wonya bɔ akora a, wobɛtene wo nsa, na obi abɔ wo abɔsoɔ, na ɔde wo akɔ faako a wompɛ.

verse.content: (Ɔkaa yei de kyerɛɛ owu ko a ɔde bɛhyɛ Onyankopɔn animuonyam.) Na ɔkaa yei no, ɔsee no sɛ:

wj.content: Di m’akyi!

verse.content: Ɛnna Petro danee n’ani no, ɔhunuu osuani a Yesu dɔ no no sɛ ɔdi wɔn akyire, ɔno na ɔtweree ne kokom adidie no ase a ɔkaa sɛ: Awurade, hwan ne deɛ ɔbɛyi wo ama no?
Ɔno na Petro hunuu no no, ɔsee Yesu sɛ: Awurade, na oyi ɛ?
Yesu see no sɛ:

wj.content: Sɛ mepɛ sɛ ɔtena hɔ kɔsi sɛ mɛba a, ɛfa wo ho bɛn? Wo deɛ, di m’akyi!

verse.content: Ɛnna asɛm yi trɛɛ anuanom no mu sɛ saa osuani no renwu; nanso Yesu anka ankyerɛ no sɛ ɔrenwu, na ɔse:

wj.content: Mepɛ sɛ ɔtena hɔ kɔsi sɛ mɛba a, ɛfa wo ho bɛn?

verse.content: Oyi ne osuani a ɔdi yeinom ho adanseɛ na ɔtwerɛɛ yeinom no; na yɛnim sɛ n’adanseɛ no yɛ nokorɛ.
Na nnoɔma pii wɔ hɔ nso a Yesu yɛeɛ, ɛno na sɛ wɔtwerɛɛ ne nyinaa mmaako mmaako a, anka mesusu sɛ, nwoma a wɔbɛtwerɛ no rensene wiase mpo.
